original: yasmin punaḥ pudgalasattvapūruṣā neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //

original: nanu ca- utpādādīnāmabhāve sati yadi sarvadharmāṇāṃ mṛṣātvapratipādanārthamidamārabdhavānācāryaḥ nanvevaṃ sati yanmṛṣā na tadastīti na santyakuśalāni

original: kiṃ punaḥ- mṛṣāsvabhāvā api padārthāḥ saṃkleśavyavadānanibandhanaṃ bhavanti /

original: tadyathā kulaputra māyākāranāṭake pratyupasthite māyākāranirmitāṃ striyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaścidrāgaparītacittāḥ parṣacchāradyabhayena utthāyāsanādapakrāmet,

tena vayam araṇī āyataneṣu dhyāna sukha sparśa vihāraiḥ vihariṣyāmaḥ

original: nirmitakāvavocatām- tena hi āyuṣmantaḥ saṃgāsyāmo na vivadiṣyāmaḥ /

atha teṣām pañcānām bhikṣu śatānām an upādāya āśravebhyaḥ cittāni vimuktāni abhūvan

original: iti hyāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ paripṛcchatasteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ prativisarjayatāṃ tasyāṃ parṣadi aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāśravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,

original: ityevaṃ mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyāṃ tathāgatanirmitābhyāṃ bhikṣubhyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ vyavadānanibandhanaṃ kṛtamiti //
analyzed: iti evam mṛṣāsvabhāvābhyām tathāgata nirmitābhyām bhikṣubhyām pañcānām bhikṣu śatānām vyavadāna nibandhanam kṛtam iti
uktam ca ārya vajramaṇḍāyām dhāraṇyām

original: tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍaṃ ca pratītya mathanīṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya hastavyāyāmaṃ ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavatīti agnirabhinirvartate /
analyzed: tat yathā mañjuśrīḥ kāṇḍam ca pratītya mathanīm ca pratītya puruṣasya hasta vyāyāmam ca pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavati iti agniḥ abhinirvartate

original: sa cāgnisaṃtāpo na kāṇḍasaṃniśrito na mathanīsaṃniśrito na puruṣahastavyāyāmasaṃniśritaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca agni saṃtāpaḥ na kāṇḍa saṃniśritaḥ na mathanī saṃniśritaḥ na puruṣa hasta vyāyāma saṃniśritaḥ

original: evameva mañjuśrīḥ asadviparyāsamohitasya puruṣapudgalasya utpadyate rāgaparidāho dveṣaparidāho mohaparidāhaḥ /
analyzed: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ asat viparyāsa mohitasya puruṣa pudgalasya utpadyate rāga paridāhaḥ dveṣa paridāhaḥ moha paridāhaḥ

original: sa ca paridāho nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayamantareṇa sthitaḥ //
analyzed: sa ca paridāhaḥ na adhyātmam na bahirdhā na ubhayam antareṇa sthitaḥ

original: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yaducyate moha iti,
analyzed: api tu mañjuśrīḥ yat ucyate mohaḥ iti

original: atyantamukto hi mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmairmohastenocyate moha iti /

original: tathā narakamukhā mañjuśrīḥ sarvadharmā idaṃ dhāraṇīpadam /

āha katham bhagavan idam dhāraṇī padam
āha narakāḥ mañjuśrīḥ sva vikalpa saṃbhūtāḥ
āha kutra bhagavat narakāḥ samavasaranti
bhagavān āha ākāśa samavasaraṇāḥ mañjuśrīḥ narakāḥ

original: tatkiṃ manyase mañjuśrīḥ svavikalpasaṃbhūtā narakā uta svabhāvasaṃbhūtāḥ?
analyzed: tat kim manyase mañjuśrīḥ sva vikalpa saṃbhūtāḥ narakāḥ uta svabhāva saṃbhūtāḥ

original: āha- svavikalpenaiva bhagavan sarvabālapṛthagjanāṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokaṃ saṃjānanti /
analyzed: āha sva vikalpena eva bhagavan sarva bāla pṛthagjanām naraka tiryagyoni yama lokam saṃjānanti

original: te ca asatsamāropeṇa duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti duḥkhamanubhavanti triṣvapyapāyeṣu //
analyzed: te ca asat samāropeṇa duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti duḥkham anubhavanti triṣu api apāyeṣu

original: yathā cāhaṃ bhagavan narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakaṃ duḥkham /
analyzed: yathā ca aham bhagavat narakān paśyāmi tathā nārakam duḥkham

original: tadyathā bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato narakagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
analyzed: tat yathā bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapna antara gataḥ naraka gatam ātmānam saṃjānīte

original: sa tatra kvathitāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmanekapauruṣāyāṃ lohakumbhyāṃ prakṣiptamātmānaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt /
analyzed: sa tatra kvathitāyām saṃprajvalitāyām aneka pauruṣāyām loha kumbhyām prakṣiptam ātmānam saṃjānūṣyāt

analyzed: sa tatra kharām kaṭukām tūṣvrām duḥkhām vedanām vedayet

original: sa tatra mānasaṃ paridāhaṃ saṃjānŌṣyāt uttraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta /

analyzed: sa tatra pratibuddhaḥ samānaḥ aho duḥkham
aho duḥkham

original: atha tasya mitrajñāti sālohitāḥ paripṛccheyuḥ- kena tatte duḥkhamiti /

iyam strī
mama eṣā strī

original: tasya tena cchandarāgaparyavasthitena cittena bhogaparyeṣṭiṃ cittaṃ krāmayanti /

sa tatonidānam kalaha vigraha vivādam saṃjanayati
tasya praduṣṭa indriyasya vairam saṃjāyate

original: sa tena saṃjñāviparyāsena kālagataḥ samāno bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti //
analyzed: sa tena saṃjñā viparyāsena kālagataḥ samānaḥ bahūni kalpa sahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhām vedanām vedayamānam ātmānam saṃjānāti

original: tadyathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitrajñātisālohitā evaṃ vadanti- mā bhaiḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā bhagavan tasya puruṣasya mitra jñāti sālohitāḥ evam vadanti mā bhaiḥ
mā bhaiḥ bho puruṣa
suptaḥ hi tvam
na tvam itas kutaścid nirgataḥ iti

original: evameva buddhā bhagavantaścaturviparyāsaviparyastānāṃ sattvānāmevaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti- nātra strī na puruṣo na sattvo na jīvo na puruṣo na
analyzed: evam eva buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ catur viparyāsa viparyastānām sattvānām evam dharmam deśayanti na atra strī na puruṣaḥ na sattvaḥ na jīvaḥ na puruṣaḥ na
vitathāḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
asantaḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
ime sarva dharmāḥ
māyā upamāḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
svapna upamāḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
nirmita upamāḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
udaka candra upamāḥ ime sarva dharmāḥ
iti vistaraḥ

original: te imāṃ tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā vigatarāgān sarvadharmān paśyanti /
analyzed: te imām tathāgatasya dharma deśanām śrutvā vigata rāgān sarva dharmān paśyanti
vigata mohān sarva dharmān paśyanti asvabhāvān anāvaraṇān
te ākāśa sthitena cetasā kālam kurvanti

original: te kālagatāḥ samānā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvānti /
analyzed: te kālagatāḥ samānāḥ nirupadhi śeṣe nirvāṇa dhātau parinirvānti
evam aham bhagavat narakān paśyāmi iti
uktam ca ārya upāliparipṛcchāyām

original: bhaya darśita nairayikaṃ me sattvasahasra savejita naike /
analyzed: bhaya darśita nairayikam me sattva sahasra savejita na eke

original: na ca vidyati kaściha sattva yo cyutu gacchati ghoramapāyam //
analyzed: na ca vidyati kaścid sattva gacchati ghoram apāyam

original: na ca kāraku kāraṇa santi yehi kṛtā asitomaraśastrāḥ /
analyzed: na ca santi kṛtāḥ asi tomara śastrāḥ

original: kalpavaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ //
analyzed: kalpa vaśena tu paśyati tatra kāyi patanti apāyita śastrāḥ
citra manorama sajjita puṣpāḥ manojñāḥ

original: teṣvapi kāraku nāstiha kaści te 'pi ca sthāpita kalpavaśena //
analyzed: teṣu api kaści ca sthāpita kalpa vaśena

original: kalpavaśena vikalpitu lokaḥ saṃjñagaheṇa vikalpitu bālaḥ /
analyzed: kalpa vaśena lokaḥ bālaḥ

original: so ca gaho agaho asabhūto māyamarīcisamā hi vikalpāḥ //
analyzed: saḥ ca gahaḥ a gahaḥ māya marīci samāḥ hi vikalpāḥ

original: tadevamete 'svabhāvā bhāvāḥ svaviparyāsaviṭhapitā bālānāṃ saṃkleśahetavo bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam //
analyzed: tat evam ete svabhāvāḥ bhāvāḥ bālānām saṃkleśa hetavaḥ bhavanti saṃsāre iti sthitam

original: yathā ca mṛṣāsvabhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānahetutvaṃ tathā madhyamakāvatārādvistareṇāvaseyam //
analyzed: yathā ca mṛṣā svabhāvānām padārthānām saṃkleśa vyavadāna hetu tvam tathā madhyamaka avatārāt vistareṇa avaseyam

original: atrāha- yadi svataḥ parataḥ ubhayato 'hetutaśca nāsti bhāvānāmutpādaḥ,
analyzed: atra āha yadi svatas paratas ubhayatas hetutaḥ ca na asti bhāvānām utpādaḥ

original: tatra kathamavidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityuktaṃ bhagavatā? ucyate /
analyzed: tatra katham avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ iti uktam bhagavatā ucyate
saṃvṛtiḥ eva na tattvam
kim saṃvṛteḥ vyavasthānam vaktavyam
idaṃpratyaya tā mātreṇa saṃvṛteḥ siddhiḥ abhyupagamyate
na tu pakṣa catuṣṭaya abhyupagamena sa svabhāva vāda prasaṅgāt
tasya ca ayukta tvāt

original: idaṃpratyayatāmātrābhyupagame hi sati hetuphalayoranyonyāpekṣatvānnāsti svābhāvikī siddhiriti nāsti sasvabhāvavādaḥ /
analyzed: idaṃpratyaya tā mātra abhyupagame hi sati hetu phalayoḥ anyonya apekṣa tvāt na asti svābhāvikī siddhiḥ iti na asti sa svabhāva vādaḥ
atas eva uktam
svayam kṛtam para kṛtam dvābhyām kṛtam ahetukam
tārkikaiḥ iṣyate duḥkham tvayā tu uktam pratītya jam
iha api vakṣyati

original: pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
analyzed: pratītya kārakaḥ karma tam pratītya ca kārakam
karma pravartate na anyat paśyāmaḥ siddhi kāraṇam iti
bhagavatā api etāvat mātram evā uktam
tatra ayam dharma saṃketaḥ yat uta asmin sati idam bhavati
asya utpādāt idam utpadyate
yat uta avidyā pratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ
saṃskāra pratyayam vijñānam ityādi

original: atra kecitparicodayanti- anutpannā bhāvā iti kimayaṃ pramāṇajo niścaya utāpramāṇajaḥ?
analyzed: atra kecid paricodayanti anutpannāḥ bhāvāḥ iti kim ayam pramāṇa jaḥ niścayaḥ uta apramāṇa jaḥ
tatra yadi pramāṇa jaḥ iṣyate

original: tadedaṃ vaktavyam- kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi,
analyzed: tadā idam vaktavyam kati pramāṇāni kiṃlakṣaṇāni kiṃviṣayāṇi

original: kiṃ svata utpannāni kiṃ parata ubhayato 'hetuto veti /
analyzed: kim svatas utpannāni kim paratas ubhayatas hetutaḥ vā iti
atha a pramāṇa jaḥ
sa na yuktaḥ
pramāṇa adhīna tvāt prameya adhigamasya

original: anadhigato hyartho na vinā pramāṇairadhigantuṃ śakyata iti pramāṇābhāvādarthādhigamābhāve sati kuto 'yaṃ samyagniścaya iti na yuktametadaniṣpannā  #
analyzed: anadhigataḥ hi arthaḥ na vinā pramāṇaiḥ adhigantum śakyate iti pramāṇa abhāvāt artha adhigama abhāve sati kutas yam samyak niścayaḥ iti na yuktam etat aniṣpannā
bhāvāḥ iti

original: yato vāyaṃ niścayo bhavato 'nutpannā bhāvā iti bhaviṣyati,
analyzed: yatas vā ayam niścayaḥ bhavataḥ na utpannāḥ bhāvāḥ iti bhaviṣyati
tatas eva mama api sarva bhāvāḥ santi iti

original: yathā cāyaṃ te niścayaḥ- anutpannāḥ sarvadharmā iti,
analyzed: yathā ca ayam te niścayaḥ anutpannāḥ sarva dharmāḥ iti
tathā eva mama api sarva bhāva utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: atha te nāsti niścayo 'nutpannāḥ sarvabhāvā iti,
analyzed: atha te na asti niścayaḥ na utpannāḥ sarva bhāvāḥ iti
tadā svayam aniścitasya para pratyāyana asaṃbhavāt śāstra ārambha vaiyarthyam eva iti santi apratiṣiddhāḥ sarva bhāvāḥ iti
ucyate yadi kaścid niścayaḥ nāma asmākam syāt
sa pramāṇa jaḥ vā syāt apramāṇa jaḥ vā
na tu asti
kim kāraṇam
iha aniścaya saṃbhave sati syāt tad pratipakṣaḥ tad apekṣaḥ niścayaḥ
yadā tu aniścayaḥ eva tāvat asmākam na asti
tadā kutas tad viruddha aviruddhaḥ niścayaḥ syāt saṃbandhi antara nirapekṣa tvāt
khara viṣāṇasya hrasva dīrgha tā vat
yadā ca evam niścayasya abhāvaḥ
tadā kasya prasiddhaya rtham pramāṇāni parikalpayiṣyāmaḥ

original: kuto vaiṣāṃ saṃkhyā lakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo vā bhaviṣyati- svataḥ parata ubhayato 'hetuto vā samutpattiriti sarvametanna vaktavyamasmābhiḥ //
analyzed: kutas vā eṣām saṃkhyā lakṣaṇam viṣayaḥ vā bhaviṣyati svatas paratas ubhayatas hetutaḥ vā samutpattiḥ iti sarvam etat na vaktavyam asmābhiḥ
yadi evam niścayaḥ na asti sarvatas

original: kathaṃ punaridaṃ niścitarūpaṃ vākyamupalabhyate bhavatām- na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetuto bhāvā bhavantīti? ucyate /
analyzed: katham punar idam niścita rūpam vākyam upalabhyate bhavatām na svatas nā api paratas na dvābhyām nā api ahetutaḥ bhāvāḥ bhavanti iti ucyate
niścitam idam vākyam lokasya sva prasiddhayā evā upapattyā nāryāṇām
kim khalu āryāṇām upapattiḥ na asti
kena etat uktam asti vā na asti vā iti
parama arthaḥ hi āryāṇām tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ
tatas kutas tatra prapañca saṃbhavaḥ yat upapattiḥ anupapattiḥ vā syāt
yadi hi āryāḥ upapattim na varṇayanti
kena khalu idānīm parama artham lokam bodhayiṣyanti
na khalu āryāḥ loka saṃvyavahāreṇa upapattim varṇayanti

original: kiṃ tu lokata eva yā prasiddhopapattiḥ,
analyzed: kim tu lokataḥ eva yā prasiddhā upapattiḥ
tām para avabodha artham abhyupetya tayā eva lokam bodhayanti

original: yathaiva hi vidyamānāmapi śarīrāśucitāṃ viparyāsānugatā rāgiṇo nopalabhante,
analyzed: yathā eva hi vidyamānām api śarīra aśuci tām viparyāsa anugatāḥ rāgiṇaḥ na upalabhante
śubha ākāram ca abhūtam adhyāropya parikliśyante
teṣām vairāgya artham

original: devo vā śubhasaṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāyadoṣānupavarṇayet- santyasmin kāye keśā ityādinā /
analyzed: devaḥ vā śubha saṃjñayā prāk pracchāditān kāya doṣān upavarṇayet santi asmin kāye keśāḥ ityādinā

original: te ca tasyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā vimuktā vairāgyamāsādayeyuḥ /
analyzed: te ca tasyāḥ śubha saṃjñāyāḥ vimuktāḥ vairāgyam āsādayeyuḥ

original: evamihāpyāryaiḥ sarvathāpyanupalabhyamānātmakaṃ bhāvānāmavidyātimiropahatamatinayanatayā viparītaṃ svabhāvamadhyāropya kvacicca kaṃcidviśeṣamatitarāṃ  #
analyzed: evam iha api āryaiḥ sarvathā api anupalabhyamāna ātmakam bhāvānām avidyā timira upahatam ati nayana tayā viparītam svabhāvam adhyāropya kvacid ca kaṃcid viśeṣam atitarām
parikliśyanti pṛthagjanāḥ
tān idānīm āryāḥ tad prasiddhayā eva upapattyā paribodhayanti

original: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛdādibhya utpāda ityabhyupetam,
analyzed: yathā vidyamānasya ghaṭasya na mṛd ādibhyaḥ utpādaḥ iti abhyupetam
evam utpādāt pūrvam vidyamānasya vidyamāna tvāt na asti utpādaḥ iti avasīyatām

original: yathā ca parabhūtebhyo jvālāṅgārādibhyo 'ṅkurasyotpattirnāsti iti abhyupetam,
analyzed: yathā ca para bhūtebhyaḥ jvālā aṅgāra ādibhyaḥ ṅkurasya utpattiḥ na asti iti abhyupetam
evam vivakṣitebhyaḥ pi bīja ādibhyaḥ na asti iti avasīyatām
atha api syāt anubhavaḥ eṣaḥ smākam iti
etat api uktam
yasmāt anubhavaḥ eṣa mṛṣā
anubhava tvāt
taimirika dvi candra ādi anubhava vat iti
tatas ca anubhavasya api sādhya sama tvāt tena pratyavasthānam na yuktam iti
tasmāt anutpannāḥ bhāvāḥ iti evam tāvat viparīta svarūpa adhyāropa pratipakṣeṇa prathama prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ
idānīm kvacid yaḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ dhyā āropitaḥ
tad viśeṣa apākaraṇa artham śeṣa prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ

original: gantṛgantavyagamanādiko 'pi niravaśeṣo viśeṣo nāsti pratītyasamutpādasyeti pratipādanārtham //
analyzed: gantṛ gantavya gamana ādikaḥ pi niravaśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ na asti pratītyasamutpādasya iti pratipādana artham

original: atha syāt- eṣa eva pramāṇapremeyavyavahāro laukiko 'smābhiḥ śāstreṇānuvarṇita iti,
analyzed: atha syāt eṣaḥ eva pramāṇa premeya vyavahāraḥ laukikaḥ smābhiḥ śāstreṇa anuvarṇitaḥ iti
tad anuvarṇanasya tarhi phalam vācyam
ku tārkikaiḥ sa nāśitaḥ viparīta lakṣaṇa abhidhānena
tasya asmābhiḥ samyak lakṣaṇam uktam iti ced
etat api ayuktam

original: yadi hi kutārkikairviparītalakṣaṇapraṇayanātkṛtaṃ lakṣyavaiparītyaṃ lokasya syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi ku tārkikaiḥ viparīta lakṣaṇa praṇayanāt kṛtam lakṣya vaiparītyam lokasya syāt
tad artham prayatna sāphalyam syāt
na ca etat evam
iti vyarthaḥ eva ārya prayatnaḥ iti
api ca yadi pramāṇa adhīnaḥ prameya adhigamaḥ

original: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyanta ityādinā vigrahavyāvartanyāṃ vihito doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tāni pramāṇāni kena paricchidyante ityādinā vigraha vyāvartanyām vihitaḥ doṣaḥ
tad aparihārāt samyak lakṣaṇa dyotaka tvam api nā asti

original: kiṃ ca / yadi svasāmānyalakṣaṇadvayānurodhena pramāṇadvayamuktaṃ yasya tallakṣaṇadvayam,
analyzed: kim ca yadi sva sāmānya lakṣaṇa dvaya anurodhena pramāṇa dvayam uktam yasya tat lakṣaṇa dvayam
kim tat lakṣyam asti atha na asti

original: yadyasti, tadā tadaparaṃ prameyamastīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
analyzed: yadi asti tadā tad aparam prameyam asti iti katham pramāṇa dvayam
atha na asti lakṣyam

original: tadā lakṣaṇamapi nirāśrayaṃ nāstīti kathaṃ pramāṇadvayam?
analyzed: tadā lakṣaṇam api nirāśrayam na asti iti katham pramāṇa dvayam
vakṣyati hi
lakṣaṇā saṃpravṛttau ca na lakṣyam upapadyate
lakṣyasya anupapattau ca lakṣaṇasya api asaṃbhavaḥ iti
atha syāt na lakṣyate nena iti lakṣaṇam
kim tarhi kṛtya lyuṭaḥ bahulam

original: iti karmaṇi lyuṭaṃ kṛtvā lakṣyate taditi lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: iti karmaṇi lyuṭam kṛtvā lakṣyate tat iti lakṣaṇam
evam api tena etasya lakṣyamāṇa tva asaṃbhavāt yena etat lakṣyate

original: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇo 'rthāntaratvāt sa eva doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasya karaṇasya karmaṇaḥ rtha antara tvāt saḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: atha syāt- jñānasya karaṇatvāttasya ca svalakṣaṇāntarbhāvādayamadoṣa iti, ucyate /
analyzed: atha syāt jñānasya karaṇa tvāt tasya ca sva lakṣaṇa antarbhāvāt ayam adoṣaḥ iti ucyate
iha bhāvānām anya asādhāraṇam ātmīyam yat svarūpam tat svalakṣaṇam

original: tadyathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyaṃ vedanāyā viṣayānubhavo vijñānasya viṣayaprativijñaptiḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā pṛthivyāḥ kāṭhinyam vedanāyāḥ viṣaya anubhavaḥ vijñānasya viṣaya prativijñaptiḥ

original: tena hi tallakṣyata iti kṛtvā prasiddhānugatāṃ ca (Pp_21)
analyzed: tena hi tat lakṣyate iti kṛtvā prasiddha anugatām ca
vyutpattim avadhūya karma sādhanam abhyupagacchati

original: vijñānasya ca karaṇabhāvaṃ pratipadyamānenetyuktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇasyaiva karmatā svalakṣaṇāntarasya karaṇabhāvaśceti /
analyzed: vijñānasya ca karaṇa bhāvam pratipadyamānena iti uktam bhavati sva lakṣaṇasya eva karmatā sva lakṣaṇa antarasya karaṇa bhāvaḥ ca iti
tatra yadi vijñāna sva lakṣaṇam karaṇam

original: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyamiti sa eva doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasya vyatiriktena karmaṇā bhavitavyam iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: atha syāt- yatpṛthivyādigataṃ kāṭhinyādikaṃ vijñānagamyaṃ tattasya karmāstyeva,
analyzed: atha syāt yat pṛthivī ādi gatam kāṭhinya ādikam vijñāna gamyam tat tasya karma asti eva
tat ca sva lakṣaṇa avyatiriktam iti

original: evaṃ tarhi vijñānasvalakṣaṇasya karmatvābhāvātprameyatvaṃ na syāt,
analyzed: evam tarhi vijñāna sva lakṣaṇasya karma tva abhāvāt prameya tvam na syāt
karma rūpasya eva sva lakṣaṇasya prameya tvāt

original: tataśca dvividhaṃ prameyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ ca ityetadviśeṣya vaktavyam- kiṃcitsvalakṣaṇaṃ prameyaṃ yallakṣyata ityevaṃ vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: tatas ca dvividham prameyam svalakṣaṇam sāmānya lakṣaṇam ca iti etat viśeṣya vaktavyam kiṃcid svalakṣaṇam prameyam yat lakṣyate iti evam vyapadiśyate
kiṃcid aprameyam yat lakṣyate nena iti vyapadiśyate iti

original: atha tadapi karmasādhanaṃ tadā tasyānyena karaṇena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: atha tat api karma sādhanam tadā tasya anyena karaṇena bhavitavyam
jñāna antarasya karaṇa bhāva parikalpanāyām anavasthā doṣaḥ ca āpadyate
atha manyase sva saṃvittiḥ asti

original: tatastayā svasaṃvityā grahaṇātkarmatāyā satyāmastyeva prameyāntarbhāva iti, ucyate /
analyzed: tatas tayā sva saṃvityā grahaṇāt karmatāyā satyām asti eva prameya antarbhāvaḥ iti ucyate

original: vistareṇa madhyamakāvatāre svasaṃvittiniṣedhāt svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇāntareṇa lakṣyate,
analyzed: vistareṇa madhyamaka avatāre sva saṃvitti niṣedhāt sva lakṣaṇam sva lakṣaṇa antareṇa lakṣyate
tat api sva saṃvittyai iti na yujyate
api ca

original: tadapi nāma jñānaṃ svalakṣaṇavyatirekeṇāsiddherasaṃbhavāllakṣyābhāve nirāśrayalakṣaṇapravṛttyasaṃbhavāt sarvathā nāstīti kutaḥ svasaṃvittiḥ?
analyzed: tat api nāma jñānam sva lakṣaṇa vyatirekeṇa asiddheḥ asaṃbhavāt lakṣya abhāve nirāśraya lakṣaṇa pravṛtti asaṃbhavāt sarvathā na asti iti kutas sva saṃvittiḥ
tathā ca uktam ārya ratnacūḍaparipṛcchāyām
sa cittam a samanupaśyan citta dhārām paryeṣate kutas cittasya utpattiḥ iti
tasya evam bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate
tat kim anyat ālambanam anyat cittam
atha yat eva ālambanam tat eva cittam
yadi tāvat anyat ālambanam anyat cittam
tadā dvi citta tā bhaviṣyati
atha yat eva ālambanam tat eva cittam
tat katham cittena cittam samanupaśyati
na ca cittam cittam samanupaśyati

original: tadyathāpi nāma tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā na śakyate chettum,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma tayā eva asi dhārayā sā eva asi dhārā na śakyate chettum
na tena eva aṅguli agreṇa tat eva aṅguli agram śakyate spraṣṭum

original: evameva na tenaiva cittena tadeva cittaṃ śakyaṃ draṣṭum /
analyzed: evam eva na tena eva cittena tat eva cittam śakyam draṣṭum

original: tasyaivaṃ yoniśaḥ prayuktasya yā cittasyānavasthānatā anucchedāśāśvatatā na kūṭasthatā nāhetukī na pratyayaviruddhā na tato nānyato na saiva  #
analyzed: tasya evam yoniśas prayuktasya yā cittasya anavasthāna tā an uccheda a śāśvata tā na kūṭastha tā na ahetukī na pratyaya viruddhā na tatas na anyatas na sā eva
na anyā

original: tāṃ cittadhārāṃ cittalatāṃ cittadharmatāṃ cittānavasthitatāṃ cittāpracāratāṃ cittādṛśyatāṃ cittasvalakṣaṇatāṃ tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā  #
analyzed: tām citta dhārām cittala tām citta dharma tām citta anavasthita tām citta apracāra tām citta adṛśya tām citta sva lakṣaṇa tām tathā jānāti tathā paśyati yathā
tathatām na ca nirodhayati

original: tāṃ ca cittavivekatāṃ tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati /
analyzed: tām ca citta viveka tām tathā prajānāti tathā paśyati
iyam kula putra bodhisattvasya citte citta anupaśyanā smṛti upasthānam iti
tat evam na asti sva saṃvittiḥ
tad abhāvāt kim kena lakṣyate

original: kiṃ ca / bhedena vā tallakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyātsyādabhedena vā?
analyzed: kim ca bhedena vā tat lakṣaṇam lakṣyāt syāt abhedena vā
tatra yadi tāvat bhedena
tadā lakṣyāt bhinna tvāt alakṣaṇa vat lakṣaṇam api na lakṣaṇam
lakṣaṇāt ca bhinna tvāt alakṣya vat lakṣyam api na lakṣyam
tathā lakṣyāt bhinna tvāt lakṣaṇasya lakṣaṇa nirapekṣam lakṣyam syāt
tatas ca na tat lakṣyam lakṣaṇa nirapekṣa tvāt khapuṣpa vat
atha abhinne lakṣya lakṣaṇe
tadā lakṣaṇāt avyatirikta ttvāt lakṣaṇa sva ātma vat vihīyate
lakṣyasya lakṣya tā
lakṣyāt ca avyatirikta tvāt lakṣya sva ātma vat lakṣaṇam api na lakṣaṇa svabhāvam
yathā ca uktam
lakṣyāt lakṣaṇam anyat ced syāt tat lakṣyam alakṣaṇam
tayoḥ abhāvaḥ na anyatve vispaṣṭam kathitam tvayā iti

original: na ca vinā tattvānyatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇasiddhau anyā gatirasti /
analyzed: na ca vinā tattva anyatvena lakṣya lakṣaṇa siddhau anyā gatiḥ asti
tathā ca vakṣyati
ekībhāvena vā siddhiḥ nānā bhāvena vā yayoḥ

original: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // iti //
analyzed: na vidyate tayoḥ siddhiḥ katham nu khalu vidyate iti
athavā ucyate avācya tayā siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced
na etat evam

original: avācyatā hi nāma parasparavibhāgaparijñānābhāve sati bhavati /
analyzed: avācya tā hi nāma paraspara vibhāga parijñāna abhāve sati bhavati
yatra ca vibhāga parijñānam na asti
tatra idam lakṣaṇam
idam lakṣyam

original: iti viśeṣataḥ paricchedāsaṃbhave sati dvayorapyabhāva eveti /
analyzed: iti viśeṣataḥ pariccheda asaṃbhave sati dvayoḥ api abhāvaḥ eva iti
tasmāt avācya tayā api nā asti siddhiḥ

original: api ca / yadi jñānaṃ karaṇaṃ viṣayasya paricchede, kaḥ kartā?
analyzed: api ca yadi jñānam karaṇam viṣayasya paricchede kaḥ kartā

original: na ca kartāramantareṇāsti karaṇādīnāṃ saṃbhavaḥ chidikriyāyāmiva /
analyzed: na ca kartāram antareṇa asti karaṇa ādīnām saṃbhavaḥ chidi kriyāyām iva
atha cittasya tatra kartṛ tvam parikalpyate
tat api na yuktam
yasmāt artha mātra darśanam cittasya vyāpāraḥ
artha viśeṣa darśanam caitasānām
tatra artha dṛṣṭiḥ vijñānam tad viśeṣe tu caitasāḥ
iti abhyupagamāt

original: ekasyāṃ hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ yathāsvaṃ guṇakriyānirvṛttidvāreṇāṅgībhāvopagamāt /
analyzed: ekasyām hi pradhāna kriyāyām sādhyāyām yathāsvam guṇa kriyā nirvṛtti dvāreṇa aṅgībhāva upagamāt
karaṇa ādīnām karaṇa ādi tvam
na ca iha jñāna vijñānayoḥ ekā pradhāna kriyā
kim tarhi
artha mātra paricchittiḥ vijñānasya pradhāna kriyā

original: jñānasya tu arthaviśeṣapariccheda iti nāsti jñānasya karaṇatvaṃ nāpi cittasya kartṛtvam /
analyzed: jñānasya tu artha viśeṣa paricchedaḥ iti na asti jñānasya karaṇa tvam na api cittasya kartṛ tvam
tatas ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ

original: atha syāt- anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityāgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāramantareṇāpi vidyata eva kriyādivyavahāra iti,
analyzed: atha syāt anātmānaḥ sarva dharmāḥ iti āgamāt kartuḥ sarvathābhāvāt kartāram antareṇa api vidyate eva kriyā ādi vyavahāraḥ iti
etat api na asti
āgamasya samyak artha an avadhāraṇāt
etat eva uktam madhyamaka avatāre
atha api syāt yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram
rāhoḥ śiraḥ
iti śarīra śiraḥ vyatirikta viśeṣaṇa asaṃbhave pi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ sti
evam pṛthivyāḥ sva lakṣaṇam iti sva lakṣaṇa vyatirikta pṛthivī asaṃbhave pi bhaviṣyati iti
na etat evam
atulya tvāt
śarīra śiraḥ śabdayoḥ hi buddhayā ādi pāṇi ādi vat sahabhāvi padārtha antara sāpekṣa tā pravṛttau śarīra śiraḥ śabda mātra ālambanaḥ buddhayā upajananaḥ sahacāri padārtha antara sākāṅkṣa
eva vartate
kasya śarīram
kasya śiraḥ iti
itaraḥ pi viśeṣaṇa antaraḥ saṃbandha nirācikīrṣayā
śilāputra karāhu viśeṣaṇa dhvaninā laukika saṃketa anuvidhāyinā pratikartuḥ kāṅkṣām apahanti iti yuktam

original: iha tu kāṭhinyādivyatiriktapṛthivyādyasaṃbhave sati na yukto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu kāṭhinya ādi vyatirikta pṛthivī ādi asaṃbhave sati na yuktaḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ
tīrthikaiḥ vyatirikta lakṣya abhyupagamāt tad anurodhena viśeṣaṇa abhidhānam aduṣṭam iti ced
na etat evam

original: na hi tīrthikaparikalpitā yuktividhurāḥ padārthāḥ svasamaye 'bhyupagantuṃ nyāyyāḥ,
analyzed: na hi tīrthika parikalpitāḥ yukti vidhurāḥ padārthāḥ sva samaye bhyupagantum nyāyyāḥ
pramāṇa antara ādeḥ api abhyugama prasaṅgāt
api ca
pudgala ādi prajñapti vat sa śarīra upādānasya śilāputrakasya upādātuḥ laukika vyavahāra aṅga bhūtasya viśeṣaṇasya avicāra prasiddhasya sadbhāvāt
śiraḥ aupādānasya ca rāhoḥ upādātuḥ sadbhāvāt ayuktam etat nidarśanam
śarīra śiraḥ vyatiriktasya artha antarasya asiddheḥ tad mātrasya upalambhāt siddham eva nidarśanam iti ced
na etat evam
laukike vyavahāre ittham vicāra apravṛtteḥ avicārataḥ ca laukika padārthānām astitvāt

original: yathaiva hi rūpādivyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇa ātmā na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yathā eva hi rūpa ādi vyatirekeṇa vicāryamāṇaḥ ātmā na saṃbhavati
api ca loka saṃvṛtyā skandhān upādāya asya astitvam
evam rāhuśilāputrakayoḥ api iti nā asti nidarśana siddhiḥ

original: evaṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ yadyapi kāṭhinyādivyatiriktaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: evam pṛthivī ādīnām yadi api kāṭhinya ādi vyatiriktam vicāryamāṇam lakṣyam na asti

original: tathāpi saṃvṛtireveti parasparāpekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhiṃ vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvurācāryāḥ /
analyzed: tathā api saṃvṛtiḥ evā iti paraspara apekṣayā tayoḥ siddhayā siddhim vyavasthāpayāṃbabhūvuḥ ācāryāḥ
avaśyam ca etat evam abhyupeyam
anyathā hi saṃvṛtiḥ upapattyā na viyujyeta
tat eva tattvam eva syāt na saṃvṛtiḥ
na ca upapattyā vicāryamāṇānām śilāputraka ādīm eva asaṃbhavaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpavedanādīnāmapi nāsti saṃbhava iti teṣāmapi saṃvṛtyā śilāputrakādivannāstitvamāstheyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: kim tarhi vakṣyamāṇayā yuktyā rūpa vedanā ādīnām api nā asti saṃbhavaḥ iti teṣām api saṃvṛtyā śilāputraka ādi vat nāstitvam āstheyam syāt
na ca etat evam iti asat etat
atha syāt kim anayā sūkṣma īkṣikayā
na eva hi vayam sarva pramāṇa prameya vyavahāram satyam iti ācakṣmahe

original: kiṃ tu lokaprasiddhireṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyata iti /
analyzed: kim tu loka prasiddhiḥ eṣā amunā nyāyena vyavasthāpyate iti
ucyate
vayam api evam brūmaḥ kim anayā sūkṣma īkṣikayā laukika vyavahāre

original: yā? tiṣṭhatu tāvadeṣā viparyāsamātrāsāditātmabhāvasattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣāvāhakakuśalamūlopacayahetuḥ,
analyzed: yā tiṣṭhatu tāvat eṣā viparyāsa mātra āsādita ātma bhāva sattākā saṃvṛtiḥ mumukṣūṇām mokṣa āvāhaka kuśala mūla upacaya hetuḥ
yāvat na tattva adhigamaḥ iti
bhavān tu etām saṃvṛti paramārtha satya vibhāga durvidagdha buddhi tayā kvacid upapattim avatārya anyāyataḥ nāśayati
saḥ ham saṃvṛti satya vyavasthā vaicakṣaṇyāt laukike eva pakṣe sthitvā saṃvṛti eka deśa nirākaraṇa upakṣipta upapatti antaram upapatti antareṇa

original: vinivartayan lokavṛddha iva lokacārātparibhraśyamānaṃ bhavantameva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim /
analyzed: vinivartayan loka vṛddhaḥ iva loka cārāt paribhraśyamānam bhavantam eva nivartayāmi na tu saṃvṛtim
tasmāt yadi laukikaḥ vyavahāraḥ
tadā avaśyam lakṣaṇa vat lakṣyeṇa api bhavitavyam
tatas ca saḥ eva doṣaḥ
atha paramārthaḥ
tadā lakṣya abhāvāt lakṣaṇa dvayam api nā asti iti kutas pramāṇa dvayam
atha śabdānām evam kriyā kāraka saṃbandha pūrvikā vyutpattiḥ nā aṅgīkriyate
tat idam ati kaṣṭam
taiḥ eva kriyā kāraka saṃbandha pravṛttaiḥ śabdaiḥ bhavān vyavaharati

original: śabdārthaṃ kriyākaraṇādikaṃ ca necchatīti aho vata icchāmātrapratibaddhapravṛttito (vṛttiḥ?) bhavataḥ /
analyzed: śabda artham kriyā karaṇa ādikam ca na icchati iti aho vata icchā mātra pratibaddha pravṛttitaḥ vṛttiḥ bhavataḥ

original: yadā caivaṃ prameyadvayamavyavasthitaṃ tadā svasāmānyalakṣaṇāviṣayatvena āgamādīnāṃ pramāṇāntaratvam /
analyzed: yadā ca evam prameya dvayam avyavasthitam tadā sva sāmānya lakṣaṇa aviṣaya tvena āgama ādīnām pramāṇa antara tvam

original: kiṃ ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityevamādikasya laukikavyavahārasyāsaṃgrahādanāryavyavahārābhyupagamācca avyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti na yuktametat //
analyzed: kim ca ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti evam ādikasya laukika vyavahārasya asaṃgrahāt anārya vyavahāra abhyupagamāt ca avyāpi tā lakṣaṇasya iti na yuktam etat
atha syāt ghaṭa upādāna nīla ādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ pratyakṣa pramāṇa paricchedya tvāt

original: tataśca yathaiva kāraṇe kāryopacāraṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ sukha utpāda iti vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: tatas ca yathā eva kāraṇe kārya upacāram kṛtvā buddhānām sukhaḥ utpādaḥ iti vyapadiśyate

original: evaṃ pratyakṣanīlādinimittako 'pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇopacāraṃ kṛtvā pratyakṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: evam pratyakṣa nīla ādi nimittakaḥ pi ghaṭaḥ kārye kāraṇa upacāram kṛtvā pratyakṣaḥ iti vyapadiśyate
na evam viṣaye upacāraḥ yuktaḥ
utpādaḥ hi loke sukha vyatirekeṇa upalabdhaḥ
sa ca saṃskṛta lakṣaṇa svabhāva tvāt aneka duṣkara śata hetu tvāt asukhaḥ eva

original: sa sukha iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddha evetyevaṃviṣaye yukta upacāraḥ /
analyzed: sa sukhaḥ iti vyapadiśyamānaḥ asaṃbaddhaḥ eva iti evam viṣaye yuktaḥ upacāraḥ

original: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityatra tu- na hi ghaṭo nāma kaścidyo 'pratyakṣaḥ pṛthagupalabdho yasyopacārātpratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ pratyakṣaḥ iti atra tu na hi ghaṭaḥ nāma kaścid pratyakṣaḥ pṛthak upalabdhaḥ yasya upacārāt pratyakṣa tvam syāt
nīla ādi vyatiriktasya ghaṭasya abhāvāt aupacārikam pratyakṣa tvam iti ced
evam api sutarām upacāraḥ na yuktaḥ
upacaryamāṇasya āśrayasya abhāvāt

api ca

original: lokavyavahārāṅgabhūto ghaṭo yadi nīlādivyatirikto nāstīti kṛtvā tasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ parikalpyate,
analyzed: lokavyavahāra aṅga bhūtaḥ ghaṭaḥ yadi nīla ādi vyatiriktaḥ nā asti iti kṛtvā tasya aupacārikam pratyakṣa tvam parikalpyate

original: nanvevaṃ sati pṛthivyādivyatirekeṇa nīlādikamapi nāstīti nīlāderasyaupacārikaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ kalpyatām / yathoktam-
analyzed: nanu evam sati pṛthivī ādi vyatirekeṇa nīla ādikam api na asti iti nīla ādeḥ asya aupacārikam pratyakṣa tvam kalpyatām yathā uktam

original: vāyvādivyatirekeṇa tathā rūpaṃ na vidyate // iti /

pratyakṣa tvam ghaṭa ādīnām nīla ādīnām ca nā iṣyate

original: sarva eva ghaṭo 'dṛṣṭo rūpe dṛṣṭe hi jāyate /

api ca aparokṣa artha vāci tvāt pratyakṣa śabdasya sākṣāt abhimukhaḥ rthaḥ pratyakṣaḥ

original: pratigatamakṣamasminniti kṛtvā ghaṭanīlādīnāmaparokṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /

original: tatparicchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇatuṣāgnivat pratyakṣakāraṇatvāt pratyakṣatvaṃ vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: tad paricchedakasya jñānasya tṛṇa tuṣa agni vat pratyakṣa kāraṇa tvāt pratyakṣa tvam vyapadiśyate

original: yastu akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaśabdaṃ vyutpādayati,

original: tasya jñānasyendriyāviṣayatvād viṣayaviṣayatvācca na yuktā vyutpattiḥ /

original: atha syāt- yathā ubhayādhīnāyāmapi vijñānapravṛtau āśrayasya paṭumandatānuvidhānād vijñānānāṃ tadvikāravikāritvādāśrayeṇaivavyapadeśo bhavati

original: tathāpi akṣamakṣamāśritya vartamānaṃ vijñānamāśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣamiti bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tathā api akṣam akṣam āśritya vartamānam vijñānam āśrayeṇa vyapadeśāt pratyakṣam iti bhaviṣyati

original: dṛṣṭo hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśo bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ hi asādhāraṇena vyapadeśaḥ bherī śabdaḥ yava aṅkure iti

original: vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpavijñānamityevamādinā vijñānaṣaṭkasya bhedo nopadarśitaḥ syāt,
analyzed: vijñāne vyapadiśyamāne rūpa vijñānam iti evamādinā vijñāna ṣaṭkasya bhedaḥ na upadarśitaḥ syāt

original: tathā hi nīlādivijñānaṣaṭke vijñānamityukte sākāṅkṣa eva pratyayājjāyate kimetadrūpīndriyajaṃ vijñānamāhosvinmānasamiti /
analyzed: tathā hi nīla ādi vijñāna ṣaṭke vijñānam iti ukte sākāṅkṣaḥ eva pratyayāt jāyate kim etat rūpi indriya jam vijñānam āhosvit mānasam iti

original: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manovijñānasya cakṣurādivijñānaviṣaye pravṛttisaṃbhave 'pi parasparabhedaḥ siddho bhavati /
analyzed: āśrayeṇa tu vyapadeśe manaḥ vijñānasya cakṣuḥ ādi vijñāna viṣaye pravṛtti saṃbhave pi paraspara bhedaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati

original: iha tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavivakṣayā kalpanāpoḍhamātrasya pratyakṣatvābhyupagame sati vikalpādeva
analyzed: iha tu pramāṇa lakṣaṇa vivakṣayā kalpanā apoḍha mātrasya pratyakṣa tva abhyupagame sati vikalpāt eva

original: tadviśeṣatvābhimatatvādasādhāraṇakāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcit prayojanamupalakṣyate /
analyzed: tad viśeṣa tva abhimata tvāt asādhāraṇa kāraṇena vyapadeśe sati na kiṃcid prayojanam upalakṣyate

original: prameyaparatantrāyāṃ ca pramāṇasaṃkhyāpravṛttau prameyākārānukāritāmātratayā ca samāsāditātmabhāvasattākayoḥ
analyzed: prameya paratantrāyām ca pramāṇa saṃkhyā pravṛttau prameya ākāra anukāri tā mātra tayā ca samāsādita ātma bhāva sattākayoḥ

original: pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanānnendriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcidupakarotīti sarvathā
analyzed: pramāṇayoḥ svarūpasya vyavasthāpanāt na indriyeṇa vyapadeśaḥ kiṃcid upakaroti iti sarvathā
viṣayeṇa eva vyapadeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ

original: loke pratyakṣaśabdasya prasiddhatvādvivakṣite 'rthe pratyarthaśabdasyāprasiddhatvādāśrayeṇaiva vyutpattirāśrīyata iti cet, ucyate /
analyzed: loke pratyakṣa śabdasya prasiddha tvāt vivakṣite rthe prati artha śabdasya aprasiddha tvāt āśrayeṇa eva vyutpattiḥ āśrīyate iti ced ucyate
asti ayam pratyakṣa śabdaḥ loke prasiddhaḥ
sa tu yathā loke
tathā asmābhiḥ ucyate eva

original: yathāsthitalaukikapadārthatiraskāreṇa tu tadvayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddhaśabdatiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt,
analyzed: yathāsthita laukika padārtha tiraskāreṇa tu tad vayutpāde kriyamāṇe prasiddha śabda tiraskāraḥ prasiddhaḥ syāt
tatas ca pratyakṣam iti evam na syāt

original: ekasya ca cakṣurvijñānasya ekendriyakṣaṇāśrayasya pratyakṣatvaṃ na syād vīpsārthābhāvāt,
analyzed: ekasya ca cakṣuḥ vijñānasya eka indriya kṣaṇa āśrayasya pratyakṣa tvam na syāt vīpsā artha abhāvāt

original: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣatvābhāve bahūnāmapi na syāt //
analyzed: ekaikasya ca pratyakṣa tva abhāve bahūnām api na syāt
kalpanā apoḍhasya eva ca jñānasya pratyakṣa tva abhyupagamāt
tena ca lokasya saṃvyavahāra abhāvāt

original: laukikasya ca pramāṇaprameyavyavahārasya vyākhyātumiṣṭatvād vyarthaiva pratyakṣapramāṇakalpanā saṃjāyate /
analyzed: laukikasya ca pramāṇa prameya vyavahārasya vyākhyātum iṣṭa tvāt vyarthā eva pratyakṣa pramāṇa kalpanā saṃjāyate

original: cakṣurvijñānasāmaṅgī nīlaṃ jānāti no tu nīlamiti cāgamasya pratyakṣalakṣaṇābhidhānārthasyāprastutatvāt,
analyzed: cakṣuḥ vijñāna sāmaṅgī nīlam jānāti no tu nīlam iti ca āgamasya pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa abhidhāna arthasya aprastuta tvāt

original: pañcānāmindriyavijñānānāṃ jaḍatvapratipādakatvācca nāgamādapi kalpanāpoḍhasyaiva vijñānasya pratyakṣatvamiti na yuktametat /
analyzed: pañcānām indriya vijñānānām jaḍa tva pratipādaka tvāt ca na āgamāt api kalpanā apoḍhasya eva vijñānasya pratyakṣa tvam iti na yuktam etat

original: tasmālloke yadi lakṣyaṃ yadi vā svalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
analyzed: tasmāt loke yadi lakṣyam yadi vā sva lakṣaṇam sāmānya lakṣaṇam vā
sarvam eva sākṣāt upalabhyamāna tvāt aparokṣam

original: ataḥ pratyakṣaṃ vyavasthāpyate tadviṣayeṇa jñānena saha /
analyzed: atas pratyakṣam vyavasthāpyate tad viṣayeṇa jñānena saha
dvi candra ādīnām tu ataimirika jñāna apekṣayā apratyakṣa tvam
taimirika ādi apekṣayā tu pratyakṣa tvam eva
parokṣa viṣayam tu jñānam sādhya avyabhicāri liṅga utpannam anumānam
sākṣāt atīndriya artha vidām āptānām yat vacanam saḥ āgamaḥ

original: sādṛśyādananubhūtārthadhigama upamānaṃ gauriva gavaya iti yathā //
analyzed: sādṛśyāt ananubhūta artha adhigamaḥ upamānam gauḥ iva gavayaḥ iti yathā
tat evam pramāṇa catuṣṭayāt lokasya artha adhigamaḥ vyavasthāpyate

original: tāni ca parasparāpekṣayā sidhyanti- satsu pramāṇeṣu prameyārthāḥ,
analyzed: tāni ca paraspara apekṣayā sidhyanti satsu pramāṇeṣu prameya arthāḥ
satsu prameyeṣu artheṣu pramāṇāni

original: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇaprameyayoḥ siddhiriti /
analyzed: no tu khalu svābhāvikī pramāṇa prameyayoḥ siddhiḥ iti
tasmāt laukikam eva astu yathādṛṣṭam iti alam prasaṅgena
prastutam eva vyākhyāsyāmaḥ

original: laukika eva darśane sthitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā // 3 //
analyzed: laukike eva darśane sthitvā buddhānām bhagavatām dharma deśanā

original: atrāhuḥ svayūthyāḥ- yadidamuktaṃ na svata utpadyante bhāvā iti,
analyzed: atra āhuḥ sva yūthyāḥ yat idam uktam na svatas utpadyante bhāvāḥ iti
tat yuktam
svatas utpatti vaiyarthyāt
yat ca uktam na dvābhyām iti
tat api yuktam
eka aṃśa vaikalyāt
ahetu pakṣaḥ tu
ekānta nikṛṣṭaḥ iti yuktaḥ
yat tu khalu idam ucyate na api paratas iti

original: tadayuktam yasmātparabhūtā eva bhagavatā bhāvānāmutpādakā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: tat ayuktam yasmāt para bhūtāḥ eva bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādakāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ
catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ hetuḥ ca ālambanam anantaram
tathā eva ādhipateyam ca pratyayaḥ na asti pañcamaḥ
tatra nirvartakaḥ hetuḥ iti lakṣaṇāt
yaḥ hi yasya nirvartakaḥ bīja bhāvena avasthitaḥ
sa tasya hetu pratyayaḥ
utpadyamānaḥ dharmaḥ yena ālambanena utpadyate
sa tasya ālambana pratyayaḥ
kāraṇasya anantaraḥ nirodhaḥ kāryasya utpatti pratyayaḥ
tat yathā bījasya anantaraḥ nirodhaḥ ṅkurasya utpāda pratyayaḥ
yasmin sati yat bhavati tat tasya ādhipateyam iti
te ete catvāraḥ pratyayāḥ
ye ca anye puras jāta sahajāta paścāt jāta ādayaḥ
te eteṣu eva antarbhūtāḥ
īśvara ādayaḥ tu pratyayāḥ eva na saṃbhavanti iti

original: ata evāvadhārayati- pratyayo nāsti pañcama iti /
analyzed: atas eva avadhārayati pratyayaḥ na asti pañcamaḥ iti
tasmāt ebhyaḥ para bhūtebhyaḥ bhāvānām utpattiḥ asti paratas utpattiḥ iti

original: atrocyate- naiva hi bhāvānāṃ parabhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhya utpattiriti / yasmāt-
analyzed: atrā ucyate na eva hi bhāvānām para bhūtebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ utpattiḥ iti yasmāt

original: na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
analyzed: na hi svabhāvaḥ bhāvānām pratyaya ādiṣu vidyate
a vidyamāne svabhāve para bhāvaḥ na vidyate

original: iti / yadi hi hetvādiṣu parabhuteṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyastasamasteṣu hetupratyaya sāmagyā anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmutpādātpūrvaṃ  #
analyzed: iti yadi hi hetu ādiṣu pratyayeṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu vyasta samasteṣu hetu pratyaya sāmagyāḥ anyatra vā kvacid bhāvānām kāryāṇām utpādāt pūrvam
sattvam syāt
syāt tebhyaḥ utpādaḥ
na ca evam yat utpādāt pūrvam saṃbhavaḥ syāt
yadi syāt gṛhyeta ca
utpāda vaiyarthyam ca syāt
tasmāt nam ca asti bhāvānām pratyaya ādiṣu svabhāvaḥ
a vidyamāne ca svabhāve na asti para bhāvaḥ
bhavanam bhāvaḥ utpādaḥ
parebhyaḥ utpādaḥ para bhāvaḥ
sa na vidyate
tasmāt ayuktam etat para bhūtebhyaḥ bhāvānām utpattiḥ iti

original: athavā bhāvānāṃ kāryāṇāmaṅkurādīnāṃ vījādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsvavikṛtarūpeṣu nāsti svabhāvo nirhetukatvaprasaṅgāt //
analyzed: athavā bhāvānām kāryāṇām aṅkura ādīnām vīja ādiṣu pratyayeṣu satsu avikṛta rūpeṣu na asti svabhāvaḥ nirhetuka tva prasaṅgāt
tat kim apekṣam paratvam pratyaya ādīnām
vidyamānayoḥ eva hi maitra upagrāhakayoḥ paraspara apekṣam para tvam
na ca evam bīja aṅkurayoḥ yaugapadyam

original: tasmādavidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ paratvaṃ bījādīnāṃ nāstīti paravyapadeśābhāvādeva na parata utpāda iti /
analyzed: tasmāt avidyamāne svabhāve kāryāṇām para bhāvaḥ paratvam bīja ādīnām na asti iti para vyapadeśa abhāvāt eva na paratas utpādaḥ iti
tasmāt āgama abhiprāya anabhijña tā eva parasya
na hi tathāgatāḥ yukti viruddham vākyam udāharanti
āgamasya ca abhiprāyaḥ prāk eva upavarṇitaḥ

original: tadevaṃ pratyayebhya utpādavādini pratiṣiddhe kriyāta utpādavādī manyate- na cakṣūrūpādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣādvijñānaṃ janayanti /
analyzed: tat evam pratyayebhyaḥ utpāda vādini pratiṣiddhe kriyātaḥ utpāda vādī manyate na cakṣu ūru pāda yaḥ pratyayāḥ sākṣāt vijñānam janayanti
vijñāna jani kriyā niṣpādaka tvāt tu pratyayāḥ ucyante
sā ca kriyā vijñānam janayati
tasmāt pratyayavatī vijñāna jani kriyā vijñāna janikā
na pratyayāḥ
yathā paci kriyā odanasya iti ucyate
kriyā na pratyayavatī
yadi kriyā kācid syāt

original: sā cakṣurādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānaṃ janayet /
analyzed: sā cakṣuḥ ādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ pratyayavatī vijñānam janayet
na tu asti
katham kṛtvā

original: iha kriyeyamiṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate,
analyzed: iha kriyā iyam iṣyamāṇā jāte vā vijñāne iṣyate
a jāte vā jāyamāne vā
tatra jāte na yuktā
kriyā hi bhāva niṣpādikā
bhāvaḥ ced niṣpannaḥ
kim asya kriyayā

original: jātasya janma punareva ca naiva yuktam /
analyzed: jātasya janma punar eva ca na eva yuktam
ityādinā ca madhyamaka avatāre pratipāditam etat
ajāte pi na yuktā

original: kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā /
analyzed: kartrā vinā janiḥ iyam na ca yukta rūpā
iti ādi vacanāt
jāyamāne pi bhāve kriyā na saṃbhavati
jāta ajāta vyatirekeṇa jāyamāna abhāvāt yathā uktam
jāyamāna artha jāta tvāt jāyamānaḥ na jāyate

original: atha vā jāyamānatvaṃ sarvasyaiva prasajyate // iti /
analyzed: atha vā jāyamāna tvam sarvasya eva prasajyate iti
yatas ca evam triṣu kāleṣu jani kriyāyāḥ asaṃbhavaḥ
tasmāt na asti sā

original: ata evāha- kriyā na pratyayavatī iti /
analyzed: atas eva āha kriyā na pratyayavatī iti
viśeṣaṇam na asti vinā viśeṣam
ityādinā pratipāditam etat madhyamaka avatāre
na hi vandhyā putraḥ gomān iti ucyate
yadi evam a pratyayavatī tarhi bhaviṣyati iti
etat api ayuktam iti āha
na a pratyayavatī kriyā
yadā pratyayavatī na asti
tadā katham apratyayavatī nirhetukā syāt

original: na hi tantumayaḥ paṭo na yukta iti vīraṇamayo 'bhyupagamyate /
analyzed: na hi tantu mayaḥ paṭaḥ na yuktaḥ iti vīraṇa mayaḥ bhyupagamyate
tasmāt kriyā na bhāva janikā
atra āha yadi evam kriyāyāḥ asaṃbhavaḥ
pratyayāḥ tarhi janakāḥ bhaviṣyanti bhāvānām iti ucyate
pratyayāḥ na akriyāvantaḥ
yadā kriyā na asti

original: tadā kriyārahitā akriyāvanto nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ kathaṃ janakāḥ?
analyzed: tadā kriyā rahitāḥ akriyāvantaḥ nirhetukāḥ pratyayāḥ katham janakāḥ

original: atha kriyāvanta eva janakā iti, ucyate-
analyzed: atha kriyāvantaḥ eva janakāḥ iti ucyate
kriyāvantaḥ ca santi uta
na iti prakṛtena abhisaṃbandhaḥ
uta śabdaḥ va dhāraṇe
tatra kriyāyāḥ abhāvaḥ uktaḥ
katham kriyāvat tvam pratyayānām iti
yathā ca vijñāna jani kriyā uktā

original: evaṃ parikriyādayo 'pi bhāvā uktā veditavyā iti nāsti kriyāto 'pi samutpattirbhāvānāmiti bhavatyutpādābhidhānamarthaśūnyam // 6 //
analyzed: evam parikriyā ādayaḥ pi bhāvāḥ uktāḥ veditavyāḥ iti na asti samutpattiḥ bhāvānām iti bhavati utpāda abhidhānam artha śūnyam  /

original: atrāha- kiṃ na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayā ityādivicāreṇa?
analyzed: atra āha kim na etena kriyāvantaḥ pratyayāḥ ityādi vicāreṇa

original: yasmāccakṣurādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñānādayo bhāvā jāyante,
analyzed: yasmāt cakṣuḥ ādīn pratītya pratyayān vijñāna ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ jāyante
tasmāt cakṣuḥ ādīnām pratyaya tvam tebhyaḥ ca utpādaḥ vijñāna ādīnām iti
etat api ayuktam iti āha
utpadyate pratītya imān iti ime pratyayāḥ kila
yāvat na utpadyate ime tāvat na apratyayāḥ katham

original: yadi cakṣurādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānamutpadyate iti asya ime pratyayā ucyante,
analyzed: yadi cakṣuḥ ādīn pratyayān pratītya vijñānam utpadyate iti asya ime pratyayāḥ ucyante

original: nanu yāvattadvijñānākhyaṃ kāryaṃ notpadyate tāvadime cakṣurādayaḥ kathaṃ nāpratyayāḥ?
analyzed: nanu yāvat tat vijñāna ākhyam kāryam na utpadyate tāvat ime cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ katham na apratyayāḥ

original: apratyayā evetyabhiprāyaḥ na cāpratyayebhya utpattiḥ sikatābhya iva tailasya /
analyzed: apratyayāḥ eva iti abhiprāyaḥ na ca apratyayebhyaḥ utpattiḥ sikatābhyaḥ iva tailasya

original: atha matam- pūrvamapratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcidanyaṃ pratyayamapekṣya pratyayatvaṃ pratipadyanta iti,
analyzed: atha matam pūrvam apratyayāḥ santaḥ kiṃcid anyam pratyayam apekṣya pratyaya tvam pratipadyante iti
etat api ayuktam

original: yat tat pratyayāntaramapratyayasya tasya pratyayatvena kalpyate,
analyzed: yat tat pratyaya antaram apratyayasya tasya pratyaya tvena kalpyate

original: tadapi pratyayatve sati asya pratyayo bhavati /
analyzed: tat api pratyaya tve sati asya pratyayaḥ bhavati
tatra api eṣā eva cintanā iti na yuktam etat

original: kiṃ ca / iha ime cakṣurādayo vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sato vā asya kalpyeran, asato vā?
analyzed: kim ca iha ime cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ vijñānasya pratyayāḥ kalpyamānāḥ sataḥ vā asya kalpyeran asataḥ vā
sarvathā ca na yujyate iti āha
na eva asataḥ na eva sataḥ pratyayaḥ rthasya yujyate
kasmāt iti āha

original: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim // 8 //
analyzed: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataḥ ca pratyayena kim  /

original: asato hyarthasya avidyamānasya kathaṃ pratyayaḥ syāt?
analyzed: asataḥ hi arthasya a vidyamānasya katham pratyayaḥ syāt
bhaviṣyatā vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati iti ced na evam
bhaviṣyatā ced vayapadeśaḥ iṣṭaḥ
śaktim vinā nā asti hi bhāvitā asya
ityādinā ukta doṣa tvāt
sataḥ pi vidyamānasya labdha janmanaḥ niṣphalā eva pratyaya kalpanā

original: evaṃ samastānāṃ pratyayānāṃ kāryotpādanāsāmarthyena apratyayatvamudbhāvya ataḥ paraṃ vyastānāmapratyayatvaṃ pratipādyate //
analyzed: evam samastānām pratyayānām kārya utpādana sāmarthyena apratyaya tvam udbhāvya atas param vyastānām apratyaya tvam pratipādyate
atra āha yadi api evam pratyayānām asaṃbhavaḥ
tathā api asti eva lakṣaṇa upadeśāt pratyaya prasiddhiḥ
tatra nirvartakaḥ hetuḥ iti lakṣaṇam ucyate hetu pratyayasya
na ca a vidyamānasya lakṣaṇa upadeśaḥ yuktaḥ bandhyā sutasya iva iti
ucyate

original: syāddhetupratyayo yadi tasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt / yasmāt-
analyzed: syāt hetu pratyayaḥ yadi tasya lakṣaṇam syāt yasmāt

original: na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
analyzed: na sat na asat na sat asat dharmaḥ nirvartate yadā

original: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate // 9 //
analyzed: katham nirvartakaḥ hetuḥ evam sati hi yujyate
tatra nirvartakaḥ utpādakaḥ
yadi nirvartyaḥ dharmaḥ nirvarteta
tam utpādakaḥ hetuḥ utpādayet
na tu nirvartate
sat asat ubhaya rūpasya nirvartyasya abhāvāt
tatra sat na nirvartate vidyamāna tvāt
asat api a vidyamāna tvāt
sat asan api
paraspara viruddhasya eka arthasya abhāvāt
ubhaya pakṣa abhihita doṣa tvāt ca
yatas evam kāryasya utpattiḥ na asti
hetu pratyayaḥ pi a taḥ na asti
tatas ca yat uktam lakṣaṇa saṃbhavāt vidyate hetu pratyayaḥ iti
tat evam sati na yujyate  /
idānīm ālambana pratyaya niṣedha artham āha
anālambanaḥ eva ayam san dharmaḥ upadiśyate
atha anālambane dharme kutas ālambanam punar
iha sa ālambana dharmāḥ katame
sarva citta caittāḥ iti āgamāt
citta caittāḥ yena ālambanena utpadyante yathāyogam rūpa ādinā
sa teṣām ālambana pratyayaḥ

original: tadā kṣīrodakayoriva anyena anyasya saṃsargaḥ syāt /

api ca

original: na ca kevalaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasthitānāṃ draṣṭavyādīnāmanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati,

ṛte ni a taḥ

iti
atra āha yadi ghaṭāt anyaḥ paṭaḥ syāt

original: tadā ca paṭanirapekṣasyaiva ekaikasya ghaṭasya anyatvaṃ bhavet /

tat tena vinā api

original: sa eva ghaṭo na svarūpaniṣpattāvanyaṃ paṭamapekṣate /

original: na tu ekaikasya paṭanirapekṣasya ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ dṛṣṭam/

atra āha yadi khalu anyatvam evam kutaścid kasyacid na asti

yaugapadya bhāva prasaṅgāt
api ca

original: yasmādbījamātramu tvā bījakāryaṃ vṛkṣamupadarśayati pumān loke- ayaṃ vṛkṣo mayopta iti,

original: atrāha- yadi padārthāntare padārthāntarasāpekṣā parabuddhiḥ syāt,

analyzed: tat yatra samavetam sa padārthaḥ padārtha antara nirapekṣayā api paraḥ iti ucyate

ucyate syāt etat evam
yadi anyatvam eva syāt na tu asti

original: ihedamanyatvaṃ kalpyamānamanyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā?
analyzed: iha idam anya tvam kalpyamānam anyasmin vā kalpyeta ananyasmin vā
ubhayathā ca na upapadyate iti pratipādayan āha
na anyasmin vidyate vidyate

kim tadānīm anya tva parikalpanayā
anya vyapadeśa siddhaya artham hi bhavatā anya tvam parikalpyate

original: sa ca anyavyapadeśo vināpyanyatvena siddha eva,
analyzed: sa ca anya vyapadeśaḥ vinā api anya tvena siddhaḥ eva

original: ityevaṃ tāvadanyasminnanyatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idānīmananyasminnapi anyatvaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: iti evam tāvat anyasmin anyatvam na saṃbhavati idānīm ananyasmin api anyatvam na asti

original: yacca idānīṃ nānyasminnananyasmin vidyate tadvayatiriktasya padārthāntarasyāsaṃbhavād etadvayatirikte 'pi padārthe na saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yat ca idānīm na anyasmin ananyasmin vidyate tad vayatiriktasya padārtha antarasya asaṃbhavāt etad vayatirikte pi padārthe na saṃbhavati

yadā ca evam anya tvam eva na asti

original: tadā anyatvasamavāyanibandhanaḥ anyabuddhidhvanipravṛttiheturanyo 'pi padārtho nāstīti siddham //
analyzed: tadā anya tva samavāya nibandhanaḥ anya buddhi dhvani pravṛtti hetuḥ anyaḥ pi padārthaḥ na asti iti siddham
atra āha yadi api anya tvam na asti
tathā api anyaḥ tāvat asti

original: na ca asati anyatve anyo bhavitumarhati,

atra āha vidyante eva darśana ādayaḥ

tathā

ucyate
yadi bhāvānām saṃskāra aṅkura ādīnām svabhāvaḥ sti

original: yathā vartamānībhūtānāṃ saṃskārāṅkurādīnāṃ bhūyoniṣpattaye avidyābījādīnāmupādānaṃ kriyate evamanyadapi tadutpattaye na kartavyaṃ syāt,

na saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvasya yuktaḥ pratyaya hetubhiḥ

original: atha syāt- naivotpādātpūrvaṃ kasyacidbhāvasya svabhāvo 'sti yato 'sya vidyamānatvādutpattivaiyarthyaṃ syāt,
analyzed: atha syāt na eva utpādāt pūrvam kasyacid bhāvasya svabhāvaḥ sti yatas vidyamāna tvāt utpatti vaiyarthyam syāt

original: kiṃ tarhi utpādātpūrvamavidyamānasyaiva svabhāvasya hetupratyayān pratītya paścādutpādo bhavatīti /

hetu pratyaya saṃbhūtaḥ svabhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ bhavet

original: atha syāt- iṣyata eva hetupratyayasaṃbhūtatvātsvabhāvasya kṛtakatvam,

original: tasmātkṛtakasyaiva svabhāvasyābhyupagamāt kṛtakatvaprasaṅgo nāsmākaṃ bādhaka iti,

etat api na yuktam iti āha

original: svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ kṛtakaḥ nāma bhaviṣyati punar katham
kṛtakaḥ ca iti svabhāvaḥ ca iti paraspara viruddha tvāt asaṃgata artham etat

original: iha hi svo bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti vyutpatteḥ,
analyzed: iha hi svaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti vyutpatteḥ
yaḥ kṛtakaḥ padārthaḥ

original: sa loke naiva svabhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: sa loke na eva svabhāvaḥ iti vyapadiśyate
tat yathā apām auṣpyam dhātu piśāca pratyaya niṣpāditaḥ karkeṭana ādīnām padmarāga ādi bhāvaḥ ca
yaḥ tu akṛtakaḥ sa svabhāvaḥ
tat yathā agneḥ auṣṇyam jātānām padmarāga ādīnām padmarāga ādi svabhāvaḥ ca

original: tadevamakṛtakaḥ svabhāva iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayamidānīṃ brūmaḥ- yadetadauṣṇyaṃ tadaṣyagneḥ svabhāvo na bhavatīti gṛhyatāṃ kṛtakatvāt,
analyzed: tat evam akṛtakaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti lokavyavahāre vyavasthite vayam idānīm brūmaḥ yat etat auṣṇyam tat aṣi agneḥ svabhāvaḥ na bhavati iti gṛhyatām kṛtaka tvāt
iha maṇi indhana āditya samāgamāt araṇi nirdharṣaṇa ādeḥ ca agneḥ hetu pratyaya sāpekṣa tā eva upalabhyate
na ca agni vyatiriktam auṣṇyam saṃbhavati

tatas ca kṛtakam
kṛtaka tvāt ca apām auṣṇya vat svabhāvaḥ nā eva bhavati iti sphuṭam avasīyate

original: nanu ca gopālāṅganājanaprasiddhametad agnerauṣṇyaṃ svabhāva iti /
analyzed: nanu ca gopāla aṅganā jana prasiddham etat agneḥ auṣṇyam svabhāvaḥ iti

original: etattu vayaṃ brūmaḥ- nāyaṃ svabhāvo bhavitumarhati svabhāvalakṣaṇaviyuktatvāt /

analyzed: atra āha yadi prakṛtyāḥ vidyamānasya anyathātva asaṃbhavāt anyathātvasya ca upalabhyamāna tvāt prakṛtiḥ eṣām bhāvānām na asti iti ucyate
nanu ca evam api
prakṛtau kasya ca asatyām anyathātvam bhaviṣyati

original: kasya idānīṃ prakṛtyā svarūpeṇāvidyamānasya khapuṣpasyeva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
analyzed: kasya idānīm prakṛtyā sva rūpeṇa avidyamānasya khapuṣpasya iva anyathātvam bhaviṣyati
tasmāt avidyamāna prakṛtikasya anyathātva anupalambhāt
anyathātvasya ca darśanāt
asti eva svabhāvaḥ iti
ucyate

original: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātvābhāvād anyathātvasya ca darśanātprakṛtirityucyate, evamapi-
analyzed: yadi tāvakena matena prakṛtyā svabhāvena asaṃvidyamānasya anyathātva abhāvāt anyathātvasya ca darśanāt prakṛtiḥ iti ucyate evam api
prakṛtau kasya ca satyām anyathātvam bhaviṣyati

original: kasyedānīṃ prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasyaiva anyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati?
analyzed: kasya idānīm prakṛtyā svabhāvena vidyamānasya vartamānasya eva anyathātvam bhaviṣyati

original: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvaṃ nāstīti sarvathā anyathātvāsaṃbhava eva /
analyzed: tasmāt prakṛtyā vidyamānasya anyathātvam na asti iti sarvathā anyathātva asaṃbhavaḥ eva
tatas ca na asti prakṛtiḥ bhāvānām io ti vijñeyam
yat ca api uktam anyathātvasya darśanāt na asti prakṛtiḥ iti
tat api para prasiddhayā anyathātva darśanam adhikṛtya uktam
na tu asmābhiḥ kadācid api kasyacid anyathātvam abhyupetam

original: tadevamatyantataḥ prakṛtāvasaṃvidyamānāyāṃ sarvadharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tadanyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yo hi idānīmastitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ  #
analyzed: tat evam atyantataḥ prakṛtau asaṃvidyamānāyām sarva dharmeṣu asaṃvidyamāneṣu asvabhāveṣu tad anyathātve ca asaṃvidyamāne yaḥ hi idānīm astitvam nāstitvam
ca bhāvānām parikalpayati
tasya evam parikalpayataḥ niyatam eva
asti iti śāśvata grāhaḥ na asti iti uccheda darśanam
prasajyate iti vākya śeṣaḥ
tat ca etat śāśvata uccheda darśanam svarga apavarga mārga antarāya kara tvāt yasmāt mahā anartha karam
tasmāt astitva nāstitve na āśrīyeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
kasmāt punar bhāva abhāva darśane sati śāśvata uccheda darśana prasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti yasmāt

original: asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
analyzed: asti yat hi svabhāvena na tat na asti iti śāśvatam
na asti idānīm abhūt pūrvam iti ucchedaḥ prasajyate  /
yat svabhāvena asti iti ucyate
svabhāvasya anapāyi tvāt na tat kadācid api nā asti iti
evam bhāvasya astitva abhyupagame sati śāśvata darśanam āpadyate

original: pūrvaṃ ca vartamānāvasthāyāṃ bhāvasvarūpamabhyupetya idānīṃ tadvinaṣṭatvānnāstiti paścādabhyupagacchataḥ ucchedadarśanaṃ prasajyate /
analyzed: pūrvam ca vartamāna avasthāyām bhāva svarūpam abhyupetya idānīm tad vinaṣṭa tvāt na asti iti paścāt abhyupagacchataḥ uccheda darśanam prasajyate
yasya tu bhāva svabhāvaḥ eva na upapadyate
na tasya śāśvata uccheda darśana prasaṅgaḥ
bhāva svabhāva anupalambhāt

original: nanu ca bhāvānāṃ svabhāvo nāstītyabhyupagacchato mā bhūdbhāvadarśanābhāvācchāśvatadarśanam,
analyzed: nanu ca bhāvānām svabhāvaḥ na asti iti abhyupagacchataḥ mā bhūt bhāva darśana abhāvāt śāśvata darśanam
uccheda darśanam tu niyatam prasajyate iti
na evam abhāva darśanam bhavati

original: yo hi pūrvaṃ bhāvasvabhāvamabhyupetya paścāt tannivṛttimālambate,
analyzed: yaḥ hi pūrvam bhāva svabhāvam abhyupetya paścāt tad nivṛttim ālambate

original: sa nāstīti bruvan kiṃcinnāstīti brūyāt pratiṣedhyābhāvāt /

original: viparyastānāṃ tu mithyābhiniveśanivṛttyarthamataimirikā iva vayaṃ brūmaḥ- na santi sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
analyzed: viparyastānām tu mithyā abhiniveśa nivṛtti artham ataimirikāḥ iva vayam brūmaḥ na santi sarva bhāvāḥ iti
na ca evam bruvatām asmākam para hita vyāpāra parāyaṇānām uccheda darśana prasaṅgaḥ

original: yo hi bhagavan pūrvaṃ rāgadveṣamohabhāvābhyupagamaṃ kṛtvā paścānna santi rāgadveṣamohabhāvā iti bravīti,
analyzed: yaḥ hi bhagavan pūrvam rāga dveṣa moha bhāva abhyupagamam kṛtvā paścāt na santi rāga dveṣa moha bhāvāḥ iti bravīti
sa bhagavan vai nāstikaḥ bhavati
iti vistaraḥ
yaḥ tu paratantra citta caitta vastu mātram abhyupetya tasya parikalpita svabhāva abhāvāt astitva darśanam pariharati
saṃkleśa vyavadāna nibandhanasya ca paratantra vastu mātra sadbhāvāt nāstitva darśanam pariharati

original: tasya parikalpitasyāvidyamānatvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamānatvād astitvanāstitvadarśanadvayasyāpi upanipātāt kuto 'ntadvayaparihāraḥ?
analyzed: tasya parikalpitasya avidyamāna tvāt paratantrasya ca vidyamāna tvāt astitva nāstitva darśana dvayasya api upanipātāt kutas nta dvaya parihāraḥ
hetu pratyaya janitasya ca sa svabhāvena ayukta tva pratipādanāt ayuktam eva asya vyākhyānam
tat evam madhyamaka darśane eva astitva nāstitva dvaya darśanasya aprasaṅgaḥ
na vijñāna vādi darśana ādiṣu iti
vijñeyam
atas eva uktam ārya ratnāvalyām
sa sāṃkhya aullūkya nirgrantha pudgala skandha vādinam
pṛccha lokam yadi vadati asti nāsti vyatikramam
dharma yautakam iti asmāt asti nāsti vyatikramam
viddhi gambhīram iti ukta buddhānām śāsana amṛtam iti

original: tathāvidhavineyajanabodhānurodhāttu paramārthadarśanasya upāyabhūtatvāt neyārthatvena bhagavatā mahākaruṇāparatantratayā vijñānādivādo deśitaḥ
analyzed: tathāvidha vineya jana bodha anurodhāt tu paramārtha darśanasya upāya bhūta tvāt neyārtha tvena bhagavatā mahā karuṇā paratantra tayā vijñāna ādi vādaḥ deśitaḥ

original: yasmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthato jānati sarvadharmān //

original: bhāvābhāvadarśanadvayaprasaṅgo yāvat tāvatsaṃsāra ityavetya mumukṣubhiretaddarśanadvayanirāsena sadbhirmadhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvaditi
analyzed: bhāva abhāva darśana dvaya prasaṅgaḥ yāvat tāvat saṃsāraḥ iti avetya mumukṣubhiḥ etad darśana dvaya nirāsena sadbhiḥ madhyamā pratipad bhāvanīyā yathāvat iti

original: evaṃ sati baddhe mucyamāne parikalpyamāne baddhatvānmucyamānatvācca yaugapadyena bandhamokṣaṇe syātām /

na ca paraspara viruddha tvāt āloka andhakāra vat ekasmin kāle bandha mokṣaṇe upapadyete
yatas ca evam baddha abaddhayoḥ mokṣa asaṃbhava
tasmāt mokṣaḥ na asti
tad abhāvāt ca bandhanam api nā asti iti siddham
atrā āha yadi bhavatā eva saṃsāra nirvāṇe niṣiddhe
bandha mokṣau ca pratiṣiddhau
yaḥ eṣa saṃsāra vinirmumukṣūṇām avidyā sāndra andhakāra vividha kudarśana kaṭhina ati dīrgha latā saṃchādita sat patham
jāti ādi vividhā paryanta vyasana aniṣṭatara vipula vipāka phala da anuśaya viṣa vṛkṣa saṃkulam
viṃśati śikhara samunnata tara ati pṛthu satkāyadṛṣṭi mahā śaila pariveṣṭita sarva diṅmukham
viṣaya sukha āśā ati picchila vipula mahā taṭa vivara vāhi tṛṣṇā nadī mahā parikham saṃsāra mahā aṭavī kāntāram nistitīrṣūṇām parama āśvāsa karaḥ kuśalaḥ mahā dharma chandaḥ
kadā nu khalu aham anupādānaḥ nirvāsyāmi
kadā nu me nirvāṇam bhaviṣyati iti
nanu sa vyarthakaḥ eva saṃjāyate
yaḥ ca api evam utpādita kuśala amala vipula dharma chandānām kalyāṇa mitra saṃsevā dāna śīla śruta cintā bhāvanā ādi kramaḥ nirvāṇa prāptaye
nanu vaiyarthyam syāt iti ucyate
yaḥ hi evam niḥsvabhāveṣu sarva bhāveṣu pratibimba marīcikājala alāta cakra svapna māyā indrajāla sadṛśeṣu

original: ātmātmīyasvabhāvarahiteṣu viparyāsamātrānugamāt tāmeva satkāyadṛṣṭim ahaṃ mametyahaṃkāramamakārasamudācāraparigraheṇotpādya manyate-
analyzed: ātma ātmīya svabhāva rahiteṣu viparyāsa mātra anugamāt tām eva sat kāya dṛṣṭim aham mama iti ahaṃkāra mamakāra samudācāra parigraheṇa utpādya manyate
nirvāsyāmi anupādānaḥ nirvāṇam me bhaviṣyati
iti yeṣām grahaḥ teṣām upādāna mahāgrahaḥ
aham anupādānaḥ sarva upādāna rahitaḥ nirvāsyāmi
mama ca evam pratipannasya nirvāṇam bhaviṣyati iti
evam yeṣām mumukṣūṇām grāhaḥ bhavati

original: nanu tadeva ahaṃkāramamakārākhyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭayupādānameṣāṃ mahāgraho bhavati,
analyzed: nanu tat eva ahaṃkāra mamakāra ākhyam satkāya dṛṣṭay upādānam eṣām mahāgrahaḥ bhavati
na ca evaṃvidha mahā graha abhiniviṣṭānām śāntiḥ saṃbhāvyate
niravaśeṣa graha prahāṇena eva mokṣa avāptaye yāvat aham mama iti grāha abhiniveśaḥ
yāvat ca nirvāṇam nāma asti iti grāha abhiniveśaḥ
yāvat ca upādāna tyāga abhiniveśaḥ

original: tāvanniyatameva anupāyena nirvāṇaṃ prārthayatāṃ sarva evārambhā vyarthā bhavanti /
analyzed: tāvat niyatam eva anupāyena nirvāṇam prārthayatām sarve eva ārambhāḥ vyarthāḥ bhavanti
tasmāt mumukṣuṇā sarvam etat parityājyam
yathā uktam bhagavatā ārya dhyāyita muṣṭisūtre

original: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtārthādarśanāccaturbhirviparyāsairviparyastacittāḥ
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam etat avocat caturṇām ārya satyānām yathā bhūta artha adarśanāt caturbhiḥ viparyāsaiḥ viparyasta cittāḥ
satvāḥ evam imam abhūtam saṃsāram na atikrāmanti

original: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
analyzed: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat deśayatu bhagavān kasya upalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāram na atikrāmanti
bhagavān āha ātma ātmīya upalambhāt mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāram na atikrāmanti
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi mañjuśrīḥ ātmānam param ca samanupaśyati
tasya karma abhisaṃskārāḥ bhavanti

original: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyantāparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate /
analyzed: bālaḥ mañjuśrīḥ a śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ atyanta aparinirvṛtān sarva dharmān aprajānānaḥ ātmānam param ca upalabhate
upalabhya abhiniviśate
abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate

original: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
analyzed: sa raktaḥ duṣṭaḥ mūḍhaḥ san trividham karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā
saḥ asat samāropeṇa vikalpayati aham raktaḥ
aham dviṣṭaḥ
aham mūḍhaḥ iti

original: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
analyzed: tasya tathāgata śāsane pravrajitasya evam bhavati aham śīlavān
aham brahmacārī iti
aham saṃsāram samatikramiṣyāmi

ime kuśalāḥ dharmāḥ
ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ
ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ
duḥkham parijñātavyam
samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ

mārgaḥ bhāvayitavyaḥ

ādīptāḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ
yat nu aham sarva saṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam

original: tasya evamavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
analyzed: tasya evam avekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvid sahagataḥ manasikāraḥ animitta purogataḥ
tasya evam bhavati eṣā sā duḥkha parijñā
yā iyam eṣām dharmāṇām parijñā
tasya evam bhavati yat nu aham samudayam prajaheyam

original: sa ebhyo dharmebhya ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
analyzed: saḥ ebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ ārtīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate
tasya evam bhavati iyam eṣām dharmāṇām sākṣātkriyā
idam samudaya prahāṇam yat idam ebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ rtīyanā vijugupsanā
tasya eva bhavati nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ
samudayam kalpayitvā nirodhe saṃjānāti
tasya evam bhavati eṣā sā nirodha sākṣātkriyā
tasya evam bhavati yat nūnam aham mārgam bhāvayeyam

original: sa eko rahogataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ rahaḥ gataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamatham pratilabhate

original: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
analyzed: tasya tena nirvid sahagatena manasikāreṇa śamathaḥ utpadyate

original: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate,
analyzed: tasya sarva dharmeṣu cittam pratilīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate

an abhinandanā cittam utpadyate

arhan asmi
iti ātmānam saṃjānāti

original: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatiṃ cotpādayati //

original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavaṃścatvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?

yena atyanta śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ
tena mārgaḥ bhāvitaḥ
yena mañjuśrīḥ evam catvāri ārya satyāni dṛṣṭāni

original: sa na kalpayati na vikalpayati- ime kuśalā dharmāḥ,

original: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate // 10 //
analyzed: yatra kaḥ tatra saṃsāraḥ nirvāṇam kim vikalpyate

original: yatra hi nāma paramārthasatye naivaṃ na nirvāṇasamāropaḥ na nirvāṇādhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati,
analyzed: yatra hi nāma paramārtha satye na evam na nirvāṇa samāropaḥ na nirvāṇa adhyāropaḥ saṃbhavati

original: kiṃ vā tatra nirvāṇaṃ yatprāpyarthaṃ vikalpyate? athavā /

original: yatra nirvāṇe kasyacit sattvasya saṃsārādapakarṣaṇamapanayanaṃ nirvāṇe ca samāropaṇaṃ prayatnavatāpi na śakyate kartuṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayorapyanupalabhyamānatvāt,

na eva hi kiṃcid vikalpayitum yuktam
a vikalpayataḥ ca niyatam yathā udita saṃsāra aṭavī kāntāra atikramaḥ nirvāṇa pura prāptiḥ ca bhaviṣyati iti

original: atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma,

original: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau bandhamokṣaparīkṣā nāma ṣoḍaśamaṃ prakaraṇam //

atra āha vidyate eva saṃsāraḥ

original: yadi iha saṃtānāvicchedakrameṇa janmamaraṇaparaṃparayā hetuphalabhāvapravṛttyā saṃskārāṇāmātmano vā saṃsaraṇaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi iha saṃtāna aviccheda krameṇa janma maraṇa paraṃparayā hetu phala bhāva pravṛttyā saṃskārāṇām ātmanaḥ vā saṃsaraṇam syāt

original: yathāvarṇite saṃsārābhāve tu utpattyanantaravināśitvāccittasya karmākṣepakāle ca vipākasyāsadbhāvāt karmaphalasaṃbandhābhāva eva syāt /

original: saṃsārasadbhāve tu sati iha kṛtasya karmaṇe janmāntare 'pi vipākaphalasaṃbandhāt karmaṇāṃ phalasaṃbandho na virodhito bhavati /

original: kāni punastāni karmāṇi kiṃ vā tatphalamiti tatprabheda vivakṣayedamucyate-

original: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca // 1 //
analyzed: maitram sa dharmaḥ tat bījam phalasya pretya ca iha ca
tatra āhitaḥ utpāditaḥ ahaṃmānaḥ smin iti ātmā

original: cinoti upacinoti śubhamaśubhaṃ karma vipākadānasāmarthye niyamayatīti cetaḥ /

original: ātmānaṃ saṃyamayati viṣayeṣvasvatantrayati rāgādikleśavaśena pravṛttiṃ nivārayatītyātmasaṃyamakam /

original: tadetadātmasaṃyamakaṃ kuśalaṃ cetaḥ prāṇātipātādiṣu pravṛttividhārakaṃ durgatigamanāddhārayatīti dharma ityucyate //
analyzed: tat etat ātma saṃyamakam kuśalam cetaḥ prāṇa atipāta ādiṣu pravṛtti vidhārakam durgati gamanāt dhārayati iti dharmaḥ iti ucyate
dharma śabdaḥ yam pravacane tridhā vyavasthāpitaḥ

original: tatra svalakṣaṇadhāraṇārthena sarve sāsravā anāsravāśca dharmā ityucyante /
analyzed: tatra sva lakṣaṇa dhāraṇa arthena sarve sa āsravāḥ anāsravāḥ ca dharmāḥ iti ucyante

original: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃlloke paratra ca //
analyzed: dharma cārī sukham śete asmin loke paratra ca

original: kiṃ punarātmasaṃyamakamevaikaṃ cetaḥ dharma iti? netyāha /

original: kiṃ tarhi parānugrāhakaṃ ca maitraṃ ca yaccetaḥ,

original: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmātkleśā na tattvataḥ // iti /

śānta matiḥ āha kā punar bhagavan sat kāya dṛṣṭi parijñā

original: bhagavānāha- ātmāsamutthānaṃ śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā sattvāsamutthānaṃ jivāsamutthānaṃ
analyzed: bhagavān āha ātma asamutthānam śānta mate satkāya dṛṣṭi parijñā sattva asamutthānam jivā asamutthānam

original: pudgalāsamutthānaṃ dṛṣṭayasamutthānaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiparijñā na khalu punaḥ śāntamate
analyzed: pudgala asamutthānam dṛṣṭi asamutthānam satkāya dṛṣṭi parijñā na khalu punar śānta mate
sā dṛṣṭiḥ adhyātmam pratiṣṭhitā
na bahirdhā pratiṣṭhitā
sā dṛṣṭiḥ sarvatas pratiṣṭhitā
yat tasyāḥ apratiṣṭhitāyāḥ dṛṣṭeḥ apratiṣṭhitā iti jñānam
iyam śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭi parijñā
satkāyadṛṣṭi parijñā iti śānta mate śunya tāyāḥ etat adhivacanam
yat śūnyatā ānulomikyā kṣāntyā tām dṛṣṭi na udgṛhṇāti
iyam api śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭi parijñā

original: satkāya iti śāntamate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānabhisaṃskārājātānutpādadṛṣṭayā tāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ nodgṛhṇāti,
analyzed: satkāyaḥ iti śāntamate śūnyatā nimitta apraṇihita anabhisaṃskāra ajāta anutpāda dṛṣṭayā tām dṛṣṭim na udgṛhṇāti
iyam api śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭi parijñā
sat kāyaḥ iti śānta mate akāyaḥ eṣaḥ

original: na kasati na vikasati na cinoti nopacinoti,
analyzed: na kasati na vikasati na cinoti na upacinoti
āditas eva tat abhūtam parikalpitam
yat ca abhūtam parikalpitam

original: tanna parikalpitaṃ na parikalpyate na vikalpyate,
analyzed: tat na parikalpitam na parikalpyate na vikalpyate
tat na kriyate na viṭhapyate
na utthāpyate na adhyavasyate
tat ucyate upaśamaḥ iti
śānta matiḥ āha upaśāntaḥ upaśāntaḥ iti bhagavan ucyate
kasya upaśamāt upaśāntaḥ iti ucyate
bhagavān āha ārambaṇataḥ śānta mate cittam jvalati
yat na bhūyaḥ ālambanīkaroti tat na jvalati
a jvalan upaśāntaḥ iti ucyate
tat yathā api nāma śāntamate agniḥ upādānataḥ jvalati
an upādānataḥ śāmyati
evam eva ālambanataḥ cittam jvalati an ālambanataḥ śāmyati

original: tatra śāntamate upāyakuśalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpariśuddhaḥ ālambanasamatāṃ ca prajānāti,
analyzed: tatra śānta mate upāya kuśalaḥ yam bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitā pariśuddhaḥ ālambana samatām ca prajānāti
kuśala mūla ālambanam ca śamayati ityādi
atra āha yadi buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ na ātmā iti deśitam
na anātmā iti
kim tarhi deśitam iti ucyate
nivṛttam abhidhātavyam nivṛtte citta gocare
anutpanna aniruddhā hi nirvāṇam iva dharmatā
iha yadi kiṃcid abhidhātavyam vastu syāt
tat deśyeta
yadā tu abhidhātavyam nivṛttam
vācām viṣayaḥ na asti
tadā kiṃcid api nā eva deśyate buddhaiḥ
kasmāt punar abhidhātavyam na asti iti āha nivṛtte citta gocare iti
cittasya gocaraḥ citta gocaraḥ
gocaraḥ viṣayaḥ
ārambaṇam iti arthaḥ
yadi cittasya kaścid gocaraḥ syāt
tatra kiṃcid nimittam adhyāropya syāt vācām pravṛttiḥ
yadā tu cittasya viṣayaḥ eva anupapannaḥ
tadā kva nimitta adhyāropaḥ
yena vācām pravṛttiḥ syāt
kasmāt punar citta viṣayaḥ na asti iti pratipādayan āha
anutpanna aniruddhā hi nirvāṇam iva dharmatā

original: yasmādanutpannāniruddhā nirvāṇamiva dharmatā dharmasvabhāvaḥ dharmaprakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā,
analyzed: yasmāt anutpannā aniruddhā nirvāṇam iva dharmatā dharma svabhāvaḥ dharma prakṛtiḥ vyavasthāpitā
tasmāt na tatra cittam pravartate
cittasya apravṛttau ca kutas nimitta adhyāropaḥ
tad abhāvāt kutas vācām pravṛttiḥ
atas ca na kiṃcid buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ deśitam iti sthitam avikalam
atas eva ca vakṣyati
sarva upalambha upaśamaḥ prapañca upaśamaḥ śivaḥ
na kvacid kasyacid kaścid dharmaḥ buddhena deśitaḥ iti
evam ca etat

original: athavā / ayamanyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ- yaduktaṃ prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ nirudhyate iti,
analyzed: athavā ayam anyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ yat uktam prapañcaḥ śūnyatāyām nirudhyate iti

original: kathaṃ punaḥ prapañcasya śūnyatāyāṃ nirodha iti? ucyate /
analyzed: katham punar prapañcasya śūnyatāyām nirodhaḥ iti ucyate

original: athavā yadetaduktaṃ prāgādhyātmikabāhyavastvanupalambhena adhyātmaṃ bahiśca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāramamakāraparikṣayaḥ,
analyzed: athavā yat etat uktam prāk ādhyātmika bāhya vastu anupalambhena adhyātmam bahis ca yaḥ sarvadā ahaṃkāra mamakāra parikṣayaḥ
idam atra tattvam iti
kīdṛśam tat kiṃvat

nivṛttam abhidhātavyam nivṛtte citta gocare
tatra tattvataḥ iti vākya śeṣaḥ

original: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra tattve nivṛttamabhidhātavyaṃ nivṛtte cittagocare ityāha-
analyzed: kim punar kāraṇam tatra tattve nivṛttam abhidhātavyam nivṛtte citta gocare iti āha
anutpanna aniruddhā hi nirvāṇam iva dharmatā
iti pūrvakam eva vyākhyānam yojyam

original: yāṃ ca śāntamate rātriṃ tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ,
analyzed: yām ca śāntamate rātrim tathāgataḥ nuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ

original: asminnantare tathāgatena ekākṣaramapi nodāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhṛtaṃ na pravyāhariṣyati /

original: kathaṃ tarhi bhagavatā sakalasurāsuranarakiṃnarasiddhavidyādharoragaprabhṛtivineyajanebhyo vividhaprakārebhyo dharmadeśanā deśitā?
analyzed: katham tarhi bhagavatā sakala sura asura nara kiṃnara siddha vidyādhara uraga prabhṛti vineya janebhyaḥ vividha prakārebhyaḥ dharma deśanā deśitā
eka kṣaṇa vāc udāhāreṇa eva tad tad jana manaḥ tamaḥ haraṇī bahuvidha buddhi nalinī vana vibodhinī jarā maraṇa sarit sāgara ucchoṣiṇī kalpa kāla anala sapta arka raśmi visara hrepiṇī
śarad aruṇa mahā prabhā iti
tat evam sūtre
yathā yantra kṛtam tūryam vādyate pavana īritam

original: na cātra vādakaḥ kaścinniścarantyatha ca svarāḥ //
analyzed: na ca atra vādakaḥ kaścid niścaranti atha ca svarāḥ

analyzed: kutas pratītyasamutpāda vādinaḥ hi mādhyamikāḥ hetu pratyayān prāpya pratītya samutpanna tvāt sarvam eva ihaloka paralokam niḥsvabhāvam varṇayanti

ucyate

original: na laukikamṛte lokaḥ śakyo grāhayituṃ tathā //

iti āditas eva tāvat bhagavatā sva prasiddha padārtha meda sva rūpa vibhāga śravaṇa saṃjāta abhilāṣasya

yaḥ evam bhava agra paryantasya vāyu maṇḍala ādeḥ ākāśa dhātu paryavasānasya bhājana lokasya

original: sattvalokasya ca aviparītaṃ sthityutpādapralayādikaṃ sātivicitraprabhedaṃ sahetukaṃ
analyzed: sattva lokasya ca aviparītam sthiti utpāda pralaya ādikam sa ati vicitra prabhedam sa hetukam

original: tadevaṃ bhagavati utpannasarvajñabuddhivineyajanasya uttarakālaṃ tadeva sarvaṃ na vā tathyamityupadeśitam /

original: keṣāṃcit sarvametat tathyaṃ ca atathyaṃ ceti deśitam /

ārya jñāna apekṣayā tu sarvam etat mṛṣā

original: keṣāṃcittu aticirābhyastatattvadarśanānāṃ kiṃcinmātrānutkhātāvaraṇatarūmūlānāṃ naivātathyaṃ naiva tathyaṃtaditi deśitam /

original: tasyāpi kiṃcinmātrasyāvaraṇasya prahāṇārthaṃ vandhyāsutasya avadātaśyāmatāpratiṣedhavadubhayametat pratiṣiddham //

original: etacca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmanuśāsanam- unmārgādapanīya samyaṅmārgapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ śāsanam /

vineya jana anurūpyeṇa vā śāsanam anuśāsanam

atha api kathaṃcid

duḥkhe dharma jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ

original: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe dharma jñāna kṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ
evam rūpa ārūpya avacara duḥkha satya ālambanaḥ pratigha varjita anantara ukta aṣṭādaśa anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ duḥkha ādi ākāra utpannaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe
anvaya jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ duḥkhe nvaya jñāna kṣaṇaḥ caturthaḥ
yathā ca ete traidhātuka avacara duḥkha satya abhisamaye kṣānti jñāna kṣaṇāḥ catvāraḥ
evam kāmāvacara samudaya darśana prahātavya mithyādṛṣṭi dṛṣṭi parāmarśa vicikitsā rāga pratigha māna avidyā ākhya sapta anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ
hetu samudaya prabhava pratyaya ākāra utpannaḥ kāmāvacara samudaya satya ālambanaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ
samudaye dharma jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ

original: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharmajñānakṣayo dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ samudaye dharma jñāna kṣayaḥ dvitīyaḥ
evam rūpa ārūpya avacara samudaya satya ālambanaḥ pratigha varjita anantara ukta dvādaśa anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ
samudaya satya ākāra utpannaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ samudaye nvaya jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ
tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ samudaye nvaya jñāna kṣaṇaḥ caturthaḥ
iti ete traidhātuka avacara duḥkha samudaya satya abhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ
yathā ca ete catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ traidhātuka duḥkha samudaya satya abhisamaye
evam kāmāvacara duḥkha nirodha darśana prahātavya samudaya ukta sapta anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ nirodha śānta praṇīta niḥsaraṇa ākāra utpannaḥ

original: kāmāvacaraduḥkha nirodhasatyālambanaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntikṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ /
analyzed: kāma avacara duḥkha nirodha satya ālambanaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharma jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ

original: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe dharma jñāna kṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ

original: etaireva ākāraiḥ rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhanirodhasatyālambanaḥ pratighavarjitadvādaśānuśayapratipakṣaḥ ānantaryamārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇastṛtīyaḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ eva ākāraiḥ rūpa ārūpya avacara duḥkha nirodha satya ālambanaḥ pratigha varjita dvādaśa anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvaya jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ tṛtīyaḥ

original: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvayajñānakṣaṇaścaturthaḥ /
analyzed: tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ nirodhe anvaya jñāna kṣaṇaḥ caturthaḥ
iti ete traidhātuka avacara duḥkha nirodha satya abhisamaye catvāraḥ kṣaṇāḥ
evam kāma avacara duḥkha nirodha gāmi mārga darśana prahātavya nirodha ukta anuśayeṣu śīla vrata parāmarśam aṣṭamam
prakṣipya aṣṭa anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ mārga nyāya pratiopat nairyāṇika ākāra utpannaḥ kāmāvacara duḥkha nirodha gāmi mārga ālambanaḥ
ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharma jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ

original: tadālambanākāra eva ca vimuktimārgalakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharmajñānakṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: tad ālambana ākāraḥ eva ca vimukti mārga lakṣaṇaḥ mārge dharma jñāna kṣaṇaḥ dvitīyaḥ
etaiḥ eva ākāraiḥ rūpa ārūpya avacara duḥkha nirodha gāmi mārga ālambanaḥ pratigha varjita caturdaśa anuśaya pratipakṣaḥ ānantarya mārga lakṣaṇaḥ mārge nvaya jñāna kṣānti kṣaṇaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ
iti ete pañcadaśa kṣaṇāḥ darśana mārga abhidhānāḥ

original: evaṃ vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ ityucyate /
analyzed: evam vyavasthitaḥ āryaḥ srotaāpatti phala sākṣātkriyāyai pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate

original: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge 'nvayajñānasthitaḥ sa srotaāpanna ityucyate //
analyzed: ṣoḍaśe tu mārge nvaya jñāna sthitaḥ sa srotaāpannaḥ iti ucyate

original: ta ete aṣṭāśītiranuśayāḥ satyānāṃ darśanamātreṇa bhāvanāmanapekṣyaiva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśanaprahātavyā ityucyante /
analyzed: te ete aṣṭāśītiḥ anuśayāḥ satyānām darśana mātreṇa bhāvanām an apekṣya eva prahīyante iti kṛtvā darśana prahātavyāḥ iti ucyante

original: yathādṛṣṭasatyākārabhāvanayā tu ye paścātprahīyante te bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ /
analyzed: yathā dṛṣṭa satya ākāra bhāvanayā tu ye paścāt prahīyante te bhāvanā prahātavyāḥ
te ca daśa anuśayāḥ bhavanti
kāmāvacarāḥ rāga pratigha māna avidyāḥ
rūpāvacarāḥ eva pratigha varjita asrayaḥ

original: ārūpyāvacarāśca trayaḥ ete eveti daśa bhavanti /
analyzed: ārūpyāvacarāḥ ca trayaḥ ete eva iti daśa bhavanti

original: ete ca yathoktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante,
analyzed: ete ca yathā uktena nyāyena bhūmau bhūmau navadhā bhidyante

original: ekaikasya ca kleśaprakārasya prahāṇārthamānantaryavimuktimārgabhedena dvau dvau jñānakṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśakṣaṇaviparyayeṇa /
analyzed: ekaikasya ca kleśa prakārasya prahāṇa artham ānantarya vimukti mārga bhedena dvau dvau jñāna kṣaṇau vyavasthāpyete kleśa kṣaṇa viparyayeṇa
adhimātra adhimātraḥ hi kleśa prakāraḥ mṛdu mṛdubhyām ānantarya vimukti mārgābhyām prahīyate
yāvat mṛdu mṛdu kleśa prakāraḥ dhimātra adhimātrābhyām jñāna kṣaṇābhyām prahīyate
sthūlam hi malam alpa prayatna sādhyam
sūkṣmam tu mahā yatna sādhyam rajaka vastra dhāvana sādharmyeṇa iti vijñeyam
tatra darśana mārgāt ūrdhvam kāmāvacara bhāvanā prahātavya ṣaṣṭha kleśa prakāra pratipakṣa vimukti mārga ākhya jñāna kṣaṇāt arvāk jñāna kṣaṇa avasthitaḥ āryaḥ
sakṛdāgāmi phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
sakṛt imam lokam āgatya parinirvāṇāt sakṛdāgāmī iti ucyate
tad phala arthaṃpratipannakaḥ prayoga sthaḥ sakṛdāgāmi phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
ṣaṣṭhe tu kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī iti ucyate

original: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇādūrdhva navamakleśaprakāraprahāṇavimuktimārgakṣaṇādarvāgjñānakṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmiphalapratipannaka ityucyate /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhāt kṣaṇāt ūrdhva navama kleśa prakāra prahāṇa vimukti mārga kṣaṇāt arvāk jñāna kṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ āryaḥ anāgāmi phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
an āgatya imam lokam tatra eva parinirvāṇāt anāgāmī iti ucyate
tad phala artham pratipannakaḥ prayoga sthaḥ anāgāmi phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
navame tu kṣaṇe anāgāmī iti ucyate
kāmāvacara navama vimukti mārga kṣaṇāt ūrdhvam na eva saṃjñāna asaṃjñāta yana bhūmika navama kleśa prakāra prahāṇa vimukti mārga kṣaṇāt arvāk jñāna kṣaṇeṣu
vartamānaḥ āryaḥ arhat phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
sa deva mānuṣa asurāt lokāt pūjā arha tvāt arhan iti ucyate
tad phala artham pratipannakaḥ prayoga sthaḥ arhat phala pratipannakaḥ iti ucyate
bhava agrika navama kleśa prakāra prahāṇāt tu navama vimukti mārge vyavasthitaḥ arhan bhavati
te ete catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ pudgalāḥ

original: catvāraśca phalasthāḥ ityete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalā bhavanti /
analyzed: catvāraḥ ca phala sthāḥ iti ete aṣṭau mahāpuruṣa pudgalāḥ bhavanti

pratipannakāḥ catvāraḥ catvāraḥ ca phala sthitāḥ

original: yadi catvāri āryasatyāni na santi teṣāṃ ca parijñānāni,
analyzed: yadi catvāri ārya satyāni na santi teṣām ca parijñānāni
tadā satya darśana bhāvanā labhyānām phalānām abhāvāt pratipannaka phala stha pudgalānām abhāvaḥ eva
atas ca saṃghaḥ na asti

original: tatra (Pp_213) adhigamadharmeṇa pratyakṣadharmatayā sarvamārairapi buddhe bhagavati abhedyatvādavetya prasādalābhena saṃghaḥ, sa na syāt /
analyzed: tatra adhigama dharmeṇa pratyakṣa dharma tayā sarva māraiḥ api buddhe bhagavati abhedya tvāt avetya prasāda lābhena saṃghaḥ sa na syāt
na ced santi te ṣṭau puruṣa pudgalāḥ

original: āryasatyānāṃ ca abhāvāt saddharmo 'pi na saṃbhavati /

satām āryāṇām dharmaḥ saddharmaḥ
tatra nirodha satyam phala dharmaḥ
mārga satyam tu phala avatāra dharmaḥ
eṣa tāvat adhigama dharmaḥ
tad saṃprakāśikā deśanā āgama dharmaḥ
sarvaḥ eṣaḥ ārya satyānām abhāve sati na asti iti
abhāvāt ca ārya satyānām saddharmaḥ na vidyate

original: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddhao bhaviṣyati //
analyzed: dharme ca asati saṃghe ca katham buddhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tadā tadupadeśairupacīyamānajñānasaṃbhāraḥ taddānamānaśaraṇagamanādibhiśca upacīyamānapuṇyasaṃbhāraḥ kramād buddho bhavet //
analyzed: tadā tad upadeśaiḥ upacīyamāna jñāna saṃbhāraḥ tad dāna māna śaraṇa gamana ādibhiḥ ca upacīyamāna puṇya saṃbhāraḥ kramāt buddhaḥ bhavet
athavā asati saṃghe srotaāpatti phala pratipannaka ādīnām abhāvaḥ syāt
