na kartavyam bhavet kiṃcid anārabdhā bhavet kriyā
kārakaḥ syāt akurvāṇaḥ śūnyatām pratibādhataḥ

original: yadi hi svarūpaśūnyāḥ padārthā na bhaveyuḥ,
analyzed: yadi hi svarūpa śūnyāḥ padārthāḥ na bhaveyuḥ
sa svabhāvāḥ eva bhaveyuḥ

original: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamānatvānna kenacit kasyacit kiṃcit kartavyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tadā svabhāvasya vidyamāna tvāt na kenacid kasyacid kiṃcid kartavyam syāt
na hi nabhasaḥ na āvaraṇa tvam kenacid kriyate
a kriyamāṇā ca kriyā syāt
kriyām ca akurvāṇasya kāraka tvam syāt
na ca etat evam iti
tasmāt na a śūnyāḥ padārthāḥ
kim ca anyat
ajātam aniruddham ca kūṭastham ca bhaviṣyati
vicitrābhiḥ avasthābhiḥ svabhāve rahitam jagat
vicitrābhiḥ avasthāmiḥ svabhāva racitam svabhāvena eva racitam apratītyasamutpannam jagat svabhāva śūnyavādinām
svabhāvena eva yadi bhāvāḥ sa svabhāvāḥ syuḥ

original: tadā svabhāvasyākṛtrimatvādavyāvartanatvācca sarvamidaṃ jagadajātamaniruddhaṃ ca syāt /
analyzed: tadā svabhāvasya akṛtrima tvāt avyāvartana tvāt ca sarvam idam jagat ajātam aniruddham ca syāt
ajāta a niruddha tvāt jagat kūṭastham syāt
hetu pratyaya anapekṣam vicitrābhiḥ avasthābhiḥ rahitam apratītyasamutpannam jagat a śūnya vādinām syāt
yathā uktam pitāputra samāgame

original: syādyadi kiṃcidaśūnyaṃ na vadejjinu tasya vyākaraṇam /
analyzed: syāt yadi kiṃcid a śūnyam na vadet jinu tasya vyākaraṇam

original: tathāhi sthitaṃ tat svake svake bhāve /
analyzed: tathā hi sthitam tat svake svake bhāve

original: kūṭasthamavikāraṃ na tasya vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ // iti //
analyzed: kūṭastham avikāram na tasya vṛddhiḥ na parihāṇiḥ iti
tathā ārya hastikakṣyasūtre

original: yadi koci dharmāṇa bhavetsvabhāvaḥ tatraiva gaccheya jinaḥ saśrāvakaḥ /
analyzed: yadi bhavet svabhāvaḥ tatra eva gaccheya jinaḥ sa śrāvakaḥ

original: kūṭasthadharmāṇa siyā na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañco bhavi jātu paṇḍitaḥ // iti // 38 //
analyzed: na nirvṛtī na niṣprapañcaḥ iti

original: na ca kevalaṃ sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame laukikā eva vyavahārā nopapadyante,
analyzed: na ca kevalam sa svabhāva vāda abhyupagame laukikāḥ eva vyavahārāḥ na upapadyante
api ca lokottarā eva api
na upapadyante iti pratipādayan āha
a saṃprāptasya ca prāptiḥ duḥkha paryanta karma ca
sarva kleśa prahāṇam ca yadi a śūnyam na vidyate

original: yadi hi aśūnyaṃ sasvabhāvaṃ sarvametat syāt,
analyzed: yadi hi a śūnyam sa svabhāvam sarvam etat syāt
tadā yat asaṃprāptam tat asaṃprāptam eva

original: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptirna syāt /
analyzed: iti asaṃprāptasya ca phalasya prāptiḥ na syāt

original: tadā duḥkhaparyantakāraṇaṃ ca pūrvaṃ nābhūditi sāṃpratamapi na syāt /
analyzed: tadā duḥkha paryanta kāraṇam ca pūrvam na abhūt iti sāṃpratam api na syāt

original: sarveṣāṃ ca kleśānāṃ pūrvaṃ prahāṇaṃ nābhūditi paścādapi prahāṇaṃ na syāt // 39 //
analyzed: sarveṣām ca kleśānām pūrvam prahāṇam na abhūt iti paścāt api prahāṇam na syāt

original: tadevaṃ yasmāt sasvabhāvavādābhyupagame sati sarvametanna yujyate, ataḥ-
analyzed: tat evam yasmāt sasvabhāva vāda abhyupagame sati sarvam etat na yujyate atas
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādam paśyati idam sa paśyati

original: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // 40 //
analyzed: duḥkham samudayam ca eva nirodham mārgam eva ca

original: yo hi sarvadharmapratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samyak paśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi sarva dharma pratītyasamutpāda lakṣaṇām svabhāva śūnyatām samyak paśyati

original: sa catvāri āryasatyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ /
analyzed: sa catvāri ārya satyāni paśyati yathābhūtāni tattvataḥ
yathā uktam ārya mañjuśrī paripṛcchāyām
yena mañjuśrīḥ anutpādaḥ sarva dharmāṇām dṛṣṭaḥ
tena duḥkham parijñātam
yena nāstitā sarva dharmāṇām dṛṣṭā
tasya samudayaḥ prahīṇaḥ
yena atyanta parinirvṛtāḥ sarva dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ
tena nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ
yena mañjuśrīḥ abhāvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām dṛṣṭaḥ
tena mārgaḥ bhāvitaḥ
iti vistaraḥ
uktam ca āryadhyāyitamuṣṭisūtre

original: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- caturṇā mañjuśrīrāryasatyānāṃ
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam etat avocat caturṇām mañjuśrīḥ ārya satyānām
yathā bhūta adarśanāt caturbhiḥ viparyāsaiḥ viparyasta cittāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāram na atikrāmanti

original: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- deśayatu bhagavān kasyopalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti?
analyzed: evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat deśayatu bhagavān kasya upalambhataḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāram na atikrāmanti

original: bhagavānāha- ātmātmīyopalambhato mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāraṃ nātikrāmanti /
analyzed: bhagavān āha ātma ātmīya upalambhataḥ mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ saṃsāram na atikrāmanti
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yo hi mañjuśrīrātmānaṃ paraṃ ca samanupaśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi mañjuśrīḥ ātmānam param ca samanupaśyati
tasya karma abhisaṃskārāḥ bhavanti

original: bālo mañjuśrīraśrutavān pṛthagjano 'tyantaparinirvṛtān sarvadharmānaprajānānaḥ ātmānaṃ paraṃ ca upalabhate,
analyzed: bālaḥ mañjuśrīḥ a śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ u tyanta parinirvṛtān sarva dharmān a prajānānaḥ ātmānam param ca upalabhate
upalabhya abhiniviśate
abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rajyate duṣyate muhyate

original: sa rakto duṣṭo mūḍhaḥ san trividhaṃ karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā /
analyzed: sa raktaḥ duṣṭaḥ mūḍhaḥ san trividham karma abhisaṃskaroti kāyena vācā manasā
saḥ asat samāropeṇa vikalpayati aham raktaḥ
aham duṣṭaḥ
aham mūḍhaḥ iti

original: tasya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitasya evaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ śīlavān,
analyzed: tasya tathāgata śāsane pravrajitasya evam bhavati aham śīlavān
aham brahmacārī
saṃsāram samatikrāmiṣyāmi
aham nirvāṇam anuprāpsyāmi
aham duḥkhebhyaḥ mokṣyāmi
sa kalpayati ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ
ime dharmāḥ akuśalāḥ iti
ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ
ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ
duḥkham parijñātavyam
samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ
mārgaḥ bhāvayitavyaḥ
sa kalpayati anityāḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ
ādīptāḥ sarva saṃskārāḥ
yat nu aham sarva saṃskārebhyaḥ palāyeyam

original: tasyaiva mavekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvitsahagato manasikāraḥ animittapurogataḥ /
analyzed: tasya eva m avekṣamāṇasya utpadyate nirvid sahagataḥ manasikāraḥ a nimitta purogataḥ
tasya evam bhavati eṣā sā duḥkha parijñā
yā iyam eṣām dharmāṇām parijñā
tasya evam bhavati yat nu aham samudayam prajaheyam

original: sa sarvadharmebhya artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
analyzed: sa sarva dharmebhyaḥ artīyate jehrīyate vitarati vijugupsate uttrasyati saṃtrasyati saṃtrāsam āpadyate

idam samudaya prahāṇam
yat idam ebhyaḥ dharmebhyaḥ rtīyanā
tasya evam bhavati nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ
samudayam kalpayitvā nirodham saṃjānāti
tasya evam
bhavati eṣā sā nirodha sākṣātkriyā
tasya evam bhavati yat nūnam aham mārgam bhāvayeyam

original: sa eko rahogatastān dharmān manasi kurvan śamathaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: saḥ ekaḥ rahaḥ gataḥ tān dharmān manasi kurvan śamatham pratilabhate

original: tasya tena nirvitsahagatena manasikāreṇa śamatha utpadyate /
analyzed: tasya tena nirvid sahagatena manasikāreṇa śamathaḥ utpadyate

original: tasya sarvadharmeṣu cittaṃ na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate /
analyzed: tasya sarva dharmeṣu cittam na pralīyate prativahati pratyudāvartate
tebhyaḥ ca ārtīyate jehrīyate
an abhinandanā cittam samutpadyate
tasya evam bhavati muktaḥ smi sarva duḥkhebhyaḥ
na mama bhūyaḥ uttarim kiṃcid karaṇīyam
arhan asmi iti ātmānam saṃjānāti
sa maraṇa kāla samaye utpattim ātmanaḥ deveṣu paśyati

original: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddhabodhau /
analyzed: tasya kāṅkṣā vicikitsā ca bhavati buddha bodhau
sa vicikitsām āpatitaḥ kālagataḥ mahānirayeṣu prapatati
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: yathāpīdamanutpannān sarvadharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsāṃ vimatimutpādayati //
analyzed: yathā api idam anutpannān sarva dharmān vikalpayitvā tathāgate vicikitsām vimatim utpādayati

original: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat- kathaṃ punarbhagavan catvāri āryasatyāni draṣṭavyāni?
analyzed: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūtaḥ bhagavantam etat avocat katham punar bhagavan catvāri ārya satyāni draṣṭavyāni
bhagavān āha yena mañjuśrīḥ anutpannāḥ sarva dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ
tena duḥkham parijñātam
yena asamutthitāḥ sarva dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ

yena atyanta śūnyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ
tena mārgaḥ bhāvitaḥ
yena mañjuśrīḥ evam catvāri ārya satyāni dṛṣṭāni

original: sa na kalpayati- ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ,
analyzed: sa na kalpayati ime dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ
ime dharmāḥ akuśalāḥ
ime dharmāḥ prahātavyāḥ
ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyāḥ
duḥkham parijñātavyam
samudayaḥ prahātavyaḥ
nirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ
mārgaḥ bhāvayitavyaḥ iti

original: tathāhi sa taṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate yaṃ parikalpayet /

original: bālapṛthagjanāstvetān dharmān kalpayanto rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca /
analyzed: bāla pṛthagjanāḥ tu etān dharmān kalpayantaḥ rajyanti ca dviṣyanti ca muhyanti ca

original: ajātaṃ sarvatraidhātukaṃ samanupaśyati māyopamaṃ svapnopamaṃ pratiśrutkopamam //
analyzed: ajātam sarva traidhātukam samanupaśyati māyā upamam svapna upamam pratiśrutkā upamam

original: evaṃsvabhāvān sarvadharmān paśyan anunayapratidhāpagato bhavati sarvasattveṣu /
analyzed: evaṃsvabhāvān sarva dharmān paśyan anunaya pratidhā apagataḥ bhavati sarva sattveṣu

original: tathāhi sa tān dharmān nopalabhate yatrānunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā /
analyzed: tathā hi sa tān dharmān na upalabhate yatra anunīyeta vā pratihanyeta vā

original: sa ākāśasamena cittena buddhamapi na samanupaśyati,
analyzed: saḥ ākāśa samena cittena buddham api na samanupaśyati
dharmam api na samanupaśyati
saṃdham api na samanupaśyati

original: sarvadharmān śūnyāniti samanupaśyan na kvaciddharme vicikitsāmutpādayati /
analyzed: sarva dharmān śūnyān iti samanupaśyan na kvacid dharme vicikitsām utpādayati
a vicikitsan nirupādānaḥ bhavati
nirupādānaḥ n upādāya parinirvāti iti vistaraḥ

original: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
analyzed: iti ācārya candrakīrti pāda uparacitāyām prasannapadāyām madhyamaka vṛttau āryasatyaparīkṣā nāma caturviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
nirvāṇa parīkṣā pañcaviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
atra āha

original: yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi śūnyam idam sarvam udayaḥ na asti na vyayaḥ
prahāṇāt vā nirodhāt vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate

original: iha hi bhagavatā uṣitabrahmacaryāṇāṃ tathāgataśāsanapratipannānnāṃ dharmānudharmapratipattiyuktānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dvividhaṃ nirvāṇamupavarṇitaṃ  #
analyzed: iha hi bhagavatā uṣita brahmacaryāṇām tathāgata śāsana pratipanna annām dharma anudharma pratipatti yuktānām pudgalānām dvividham nirvāṇam upavarṇitam
sa upadhi śeṣam nirupadhi śeṣam ca

original: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyārāgādikasya kleśagaṇasya prahāṇāt sopadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇamiṣyate /
analyzed: tatra niravaśeṣasya avidyā rāga ādikasya kleśa gaṇasya prahāṇāt sa upadhi śeṣam nirvāṇam iṣyate
tatra upadhīyate smin ātma snehaḥ iti upadhiḥ
upadhi śabdena ātma prajñapti nimittāḥ pañca upādāna skandhāḥ ucyante
śiṣyate iti śeṣaḥ
upadhiḥ eva śeṣaḥ upadhi śeṣaḥ
saha upadhi śeṣeṇa vartate iti sa upadhi śeṣam
kim tat nirvāṇam
tat ca skandha mātrakam eva kevalam satkāya dṛṣṭayā ādi kleśa taskara rahitam avaśiṣyate nihata aśeṣa caura gaṇa grāma mātra avasthāna sādharmyeṇa
tat sa upadhi śeṣam nirvāṇam
yatra tu nirvāṇe skandha pañcakam api na asti
tat nirupadhi śeṣam nirvāṇam
nirgataḥ upadhi śeṣaḥ smin iti kṛtvā
nihata aśeṣa caura gaṇasya grāma mātrasya api vināśa sādharmyeṇa
tat eva ca adhikṛtya ucyate

original: abhedi kāyo nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā /
analyzed: abhedi kāyaḥ nirodhi saññā vedanā pi ti dahaṃsu sabbā
vūpasamiṃsu saṃkhārāḥ viññāṇam attham agamā ti
tathā
asaṃlīnena kāyena vedanām adhyavāsayat
pradyotasya iva nirvāṇam vimokṣaḥ tasya cetasaḥ iti
tat evam nirupadhi śeṣam nirvāṇam skandhānām nirodhāt labhyate

original: etacca dvividhaṃ nirvāṇaṃ kathaṃ yujyate yadi kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca nirodho bhavati?
analyzed: etat ca dvividham nirvāṇam katham yujyate yadi kleśānām skandhānām ca nirodhaḥ bhavati
yadā tu sarvam idam śūnyam
na eva kiṃcid utpadyate na api kiṃcid nirudhyate
tadā kutas kleśāḥ
kutas vā skandhāḥ
yeṣām nirodhe nirvāṇam syāt iti
tasmāt vidyate eva bhāvānām svabhāvaḥ iti
atra ucyate nanu evam api sa svabhāva abhyupagame
yadi a śūnyam idam sarvam udayaḥ na asti na vyayaḥ
prahāṇāt vā nirodhāt vā kasya nirvāṇam iṣyate

original: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānāṃ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ ca svabhāvasyānapāyitvāt kuto nivṛttiḥ,
analyzed: svabhāvena hi vyavasthitānām kleśānām skandhānām ca svabhāvasya anapāyi tvāt kutas nivṛttiḥ
yatas tad nivṛttyā nirvāṇam syāt iti
tasmāt svabhāva vādinām nā eva nirvāṇam upapadyate

original: na ca śūnyatāvādinaḥ skandhanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kleśanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ vā nirvāṇamicchanti yatasteṣāmayaṃ doṣaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: na ca śūnyatā vādinaḥ skandha nivṛtti lakṣaṇam kleśa nivṛtti lakṣaṇam vā nirvāṇam icchanti yatas teṣām ayam doṣaḥ syāt iti
atas an upālambhaḥ eva ayam śūnyavādinām

original: yadi khalu śūnyatāvādinaḥ kleśānāṃ skandhānāṃ vā nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ necchanti,
analyzed: yadi khalu śūnyatā vādinaḥ kleśānām skandhānām vā nivṛtti lakṣaṇam nirvāṇam na icchanti
kiṃlakṣaṇam tarhi icchanti ucyate
a prahīṇam a saṃprāptam an ucchinnam aśāśvatam
aniruddham anutpannam etat nirvāṇam ucyate
yat hi na eva prahīyate rāga ādi vat
na api prāpyate śrāmaṇya phala vat
na api ucchidyate skandha ādi vat
yat ca api na nityam a śūnyavat
tat svabhāvataḥ niruddham anutpannam ca sarva prapañca upaśama lakṣaṇam nirvāṇam uktam

original: tat kutastasminnitthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśakalpanā yeṣāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇānnirvāṇaṃ bhavet?
analyzed: tat kutas tasmin itthaṃvidhe niṣprapañce kleśa kalpanā yeṣām kleśānām prahāṇāt nirvāṇam bhavet
kutas vā skandha kalpanā tatra
yeṣām skandhānām nirodhāt tat bhavet
yāvat hi etāḥ kalpanāḥ pravartante
tāvat na asti nirvāṇa adhigamaḥ
sarva prapañca parikṣayāt eva tad adhigamāt

original: atha syāt- yadyapi nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ,
analyzed: atha syāt yadi api nirvāṇe na santi kleśāḥ
na ca api skandhāḥ
tathā api nirvāṇāt arvāk vidyante
tatas teṣām parikṣayāt nirvāṇam bhaviṣyati iti
ucyate
tyajyatām ayam grāhaḥ

original: yasmānnirvāṇādarvāk svabhāvato vidyamānānāṃ na punarabhāvaḥ śakyate kartum /

original: tathā- na teṣāṃ bhagavan saṃsārasamatikramo ye nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante /
analyzed: tathā na teṣām bhagavan saṃsāra samatikramaḥ ye nirvāṇam bhāvataḥ paryeṣante
tat kasya hetoḥ

original: nirvāṇamiti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarvanimittānāmuparatiḥ sarveñjitasamiñjitānām /
analyzed: nirvāṇam iti bhagavan yaḥ praśamaḥ sarva nimittānām uparatiḥ sarva iñjita samiñjitānām

original: tadime bhagavan mohapuruṣā ye svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya tīrthikadṛṣṭau nipatitā nirvāṇaṃ bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tadyathā tilebhyastailaṃ  #
analyzed: tat ime bhagavat moha puruṣāḥ ye su ākhyāte dharma vinaye pravrajya tīrthika dṛṣṭau nipatitāḥ nirvāṇam bhāvataḥ paryeṣante tat yathā tilebhyaḥ tailam
kṣīrāt sarpiḥ

original: atyantaparinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu ye nirvāṇaṃ mārganti tānahamābhimānikān tīrthikāniti vadāmi /
analyzed: atyanta parinirvṛteṣu bhagavan sarva dharmeṣu ye nirvāṇam mārganti tān aham ābhimānikān tīrthikān iti vadāmi

original: na bhagavan yogācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā karoti,
analyzed: na bhagavan yoga ācāraḥ samyak pratipannaḥ kasyacid dharmasya utpādam vā nirodham vā karoti
na api kasyacid dharmasya prāptim icchati na abhisamayam iti vistaraḥ

original: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
analyzed: iti ācārya candrakīrti pāda uparacitāyām prasannapadāyām madhyamaka vṛttau nirvāṇaparīkṣā nāma pañcaviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā ṣaḍviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
atra āha yat uktam
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatām tām pracakṣmahe
sā prajñaptiḥ upādāya pratipad sā eva madhyamā iti
kaḥ punar asau pratītyasamutpādaḥ
yaḥ śūnyatā iti ucyate
athavā yat etat uktam
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādam paśyati idam sa paśyati

original: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca // iti,
analyzed: duḥkham samudayam ca eva nirodham mārgam eva ca iti
tat katamaḥ sau pratītyasamutpādaḥ iti
atas tad aṅga prabheda vivakṣayā idam ucyate
punarbhavāya saṃskārān avidyā nivṛtaḥ tridhā
abhisaṃskurute yān taiḥ gatim gacchati karmabhiḥ

original: tatra avidyā ajñānaṃ tamo yathābhūtārthapracchādakaṃ stimitatā /
analyzed: tatra avidyā ajñānam tamaḥ yathā bhūta artha pracchādakam stimita tā

original: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhavārthaṃ punarbhavotpattyarthamabhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśalādicetanāviśeṣāṃste  #
analyzed: avidyayā nivṛtaḥ chāditaḥ pudgalaḥ punarbhavāya punarbhava artham punarbhava utpatti artham abhisaṃskaroti utpādayati yān kuśala ādi cetanā viśeṣān te
punarbhava abhisaṃskārāt saṃskārāḥ

original: te ca trividhāḥ- kuśalā akuśalā ānejyāśca,
analyzed: te ca trividhāḥ kuśalāḥ akuśalāḥ ānejyāḥ ca
yadi vā kāyikāḥ vācikāḥ mānasāḥ ca iti
tān trividhān karma lakṣaṇān saṃskārān avidyā nivṛtaḥ pudgalaḥ karoti

original: taiśca saṃskārairabhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karmasaṃjñitaiḥ taddhetukāṃ gatiṃ gacchati // 1 //
analyzed: taiḥ ca saṃskāraiḥ abhisaṃskṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ karma saṃjñitaiḥ tad hetukām gatim gacchati  /
tataḥ sya
vijñānam saṃniviśate saṃskāra pratyayam gatau

original: kṛtopacitasaṃskārasyāsya pudgalasya saṃskārānurūpāyāṃ gatau devādikāyāṃ saṃskārahetukaṃ vijñānaṃ saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsārānarthabījabhūtam
analyzed: kṛta upacita saṃskārasya asya pudgalasya saṃskāra anurūpāyām gatau deva ādikāyām saṃskāra hetukam vijñānam saṃniviśate praviśati upapadyate saṃsāra anartha bīja bhūtam
tatas uttarakālam
saṃniviṣṭe tha vijñāne nāma rūpam niṣicyate  /
tatra karma kleśa āviddham tasmin tasmin upapatti āyatane nāmayati iti nāma
saṃjñā vaśena vai artheṣu nāmayati iti nāma
catvāraḥ rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ nāma iti vyapadiśyate
rūpyate iti rūpam
bādhyate iti arthaḥ

original: idaṃ ca rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ ca nāma,
analyzed: idam ca rūpam pūrvakam ca nāma
ubhayam etat abhisaṃkṣipya nāma rūpam iti vyavasthāpyate
tatra bimba pratibimba nyāyena svādhyāya dīpa mudrā pratimudrā ādi nyāyena vā māraṇa antikeṣu

original: skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasminneva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmanyāyenaiva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ (Pp_239)
analyzed: skandheṣu nirudhyamāneṣu ekasmin eva kṣaṇe tulādaṇḍa nāma unnāma nyāyena eva aupapattyāṃśikāḥ
skandhāḥ yathā karma ākṣepataḥ upajāyante
evam ca bimba pratibimba mudrā pratimudrā nyāyena pratītyasamutpādaḥ sidhyati
tulā daṇḍa nāma unnāma nyāyena tu yat vijñānam saṃniviśate iti uktam
tat bāla loka bodha anurodhena
samāna kālaḥ eva bhava pratisaṃdhiḥ iti

original: tathā samānena samānakālaṃ lokasya duḥkhaṃ ca sukhodayaṃ ca /
analyzed: tathā samānena samāna kālam lokasya duḥkham ca sukha udayam ca

original: hartuṃ ca kartuṃ ca sadāstu śaktistamaḥ prakāśaṃ ca yathaiva bhānoḥ // iti /
analyzed: hartum ca kartum ca sadā astu śaktiḥ tamaḥ prakāśam ca yathā eva bhānoḥ iti

original: na tu punaḥ pratītyasamutpādasvarūpavicakṣaṇānāmevaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate sāhacaryāditvamekakṣaṇe tulādaṇḍanāmonnāmadṛṣṭānteneti /
analyzed: na tu punar pratītyasamutpāda svarūpa vicakṣaṇānām evam vaktum yujyate sāhacarya ādi tvam eka kṣaṇe tulā daṇḍa nāma unnāma dṛṣṭāntena iti

original: janmonmukhaṃ na sadidaṃ yadi jāyamānaṃnāśonmukhaṃ sadapi nāma nirudhyamānam /
analyzed: janma unmukham na sat idam yadi jāyamānam nāśa unmukham sat api nāma nirudhyamānam

original: iṣṭaṃ tadā kathamidaṃ tulayā samānaṃ kartrā vinā janiriyaṃ na ca yuktarūpā //
analyzed: iṣṭam tadā katham idam tulayā samānam kartrā vinā janiḥ iyam na ca yukta rūpā
iti ādi vacanāt
yathā bimba pratibimba mudrā pratimudrā ādi nyāyena kṣaṇika tvam na iṣyate bhavadbhiḥ

original: tathā anyasyāpi bhāvasya utpādasamanantaradhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na yuktam /
analyzed: tathā anyasya api bhāvasya utpāda samanantara dhvaṃsinaḥ kṣaṇika tvam na yuktam

original: yataḥ jātijarāsthityanityatākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛtalakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasminneva kṣaṇe bhavantītyabhidharmapāṭhaḥ
analyzed: yatas jāti jarā sthiti anityatā ākhyāni catvāri saṃskṛta lakṣaṇāni utpadyamānasya bhāvasya bāhyasya ādhyātmikasya vā ekasmin eva kṣaṇe bhavanti iti abhidharma pāṭhaḥ

original: tatra jātijarayoḥ parasparavirodhāt sthityanityatayośca ekasminneva bhāve na yugapatsaṃbhava iṣyate sadbhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra jāti jarayoḥ paraspara virodhāt sthiti anitya tayoḥ ca ekasmin eva bhāve na yugapad saṃbhavaḥ iṣyate sadbhiḥ
kṣaṇike sarvathā bhāvāt kutas kācid purāṇa tā
sthairyāt akṣaṇike ca api kutas kācid purāṇa tā
yathā antaḥ sti kṣaṇasya evam ādi madhyam ca kalpyatām
antaka tvāt kṣaṇasya evam na lokasya kṣaṇa sthitiḥ
ādi madhya avasānāni cintyāni kṣaṇa vat punar
ādi madhya avasāna tvam na svatas vā
iti madhyamaka siddhānta pāṭhāt kṣaṇika padārtha asiddheḥ asiddhiḥ avaseyā

original: na ca jātimaraṇayoḥ parasparabhinnalakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavo bhavet,
analyzed: na ca jāti maraṇayoḥ paraspara bhinna lakṣaṇayoḥ ekasmin kṣaṇe saṃbhavaḥ bhavet
saṃśaya niścaya jñānayoḥ āloka andhakārayoḥ jñāna ajñānayoḥ bīja aṅkurayoḥ maraṇa bhava upapatti bhavayoḥ bhinna lakṣaṇayoḥ ityādi vat
paraspara nirapekṣayoḥ eva sva hetu pratyaya siddhayoḥ sahabhāvaḥ yujyate savyetara go viṣāṇayoḥ yuvati stanayoḥ nara karṇayoḥ ityādi vat
na tu punar kadācid api paraspara viruddhayoḥ vināśa utpādayoḥ
yathā uktam rāga rakta parīkṣāyām
saha eva punar udbhūtiḥ na yuktā rāga raktayoḥ
bhavetām rāga raktau hi nirapekṣau parasparam

original: naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
analyzed: na ekatve sahabhāvaḥ sti na tena eva hi tat saha
pṛthaktve kutas eva bhaviṣyati

original: evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
analyzed: evam raktena rāgasya siddhiḥ na saha na asaha
rāgavat sarva dharmāṇām siddhiḥ na saha na asaha

original: iti pratiṣedhāt kutaḥ samānakālatā bhāvānāṃ maraṇabhavopapattibhavayoriti?
analyzed: iti pratiṣedhāt kutas samāna kāla tā bhāvānām maraṇa bhava upapatti bhavayoḥ iti
atas sahabhāvaḥ vineya jana bodha anurodha pravṛttaḥ evā iti lakṣyate

original: tena naikasminneva kṣaṇe nāmonnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāmonnāmayoḥ kālabhedāt /
analyzed: tena na ekasmin eva kṣaṇe nāma unnāmau tulāyāḥ saṃbhavataḥ nāma unnāmayoḥ kāla bhedāt
balavat puruṣāt śaṭā mātreṇa pañcaṣaṣṭiḥ kṣaṇāḥ atikrāmanti iti pāṭhāt
utpala patra śata sahasra vedha vat sūci agreṇa iti

original: tathāpi atra utpalapatraśatasahasravedhaḥ sūcyagreṇa kramaśo vedho 'vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānāmatisūkṣmatvāt /
analyzed: tathā api atra utpala patra śata sahasra vedhaḥ sūci agreṇa kramaśas vedhaḥ vaseyaḥ kṣaṇānām ati sūkṣma tvāt
eka kṣaṇena śloka akṣara pada udāharaṇa vat
kim ca
a nirodham anutpādam anucchedam aśāśvatam
aneka artham an ānā artham an āgamam anirgamam
yaḥ pratītyasamutpādam prapañca upaśamam śivam

original: iti pāṭhādutpādanirodhayorasaṃbhava eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake /
analyzed: iti pāṭhāt utpāda nirodhayoḥ asaṃbhavaḥ eva pratipāditaḥ śāstre madhyamake
āgama sūtreṣu
avināśam anutpannam dharmadhātu samam jagat
sattvadhātum ca deśeti eṣā loka anuvartanā
trīṣu adhvasu sattvānām prakṛtim na upalambhati

original: sattvadhātuṃ ca deśeti eṣā lokānuvartanā // ityādi /
analyzed: sattvadhātum ca deśeti eṣā loka anuvartanā ityādi
tathā
phena piṇḍa upamam rūpam vedanā budbuda upamā
marīci sadṛśī saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ kadalī nibhāḥ
māyā upamam ca vijñānam uktam ādityabandhunā
evam dharmān vīkṣamāṇaḥ bhikṣuḥ ārabdha vīryavān

original: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ /
analyzed: divā vā yadi vā rātrau saṃprajānan pratismṛtaḥ
pratividhyet padam śāntam saṃskāra upaśamam śivam iti
etāḥ ca gāthāḥ sarva nikāya śāstra sūtreṣu paṭhayante

original: ataḥ phenapiṇḍādīnāṃ hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ prāpya pratītya samutpannānāṃ sāravastuvigatānāṃ kutaḥ kṣaṇikākṣaṇikacinteti?
analyzed: atas phena piṇḍa ādīnām hetu pratyaya sāmagrīm prāpya pratītya samutpannānām sāra vastu vigatānām kutas kṣaṇika akṣaṇika cintā iti
mahāyāna sūtreṣu ca

original: supinopamā bhavagatī sakalā na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate /
analyzed: supina upamā bhava gatī sakalā na hi jāyati na ca u mriyate

original: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalu deti kṛṣṇaśubha saṃsarato //
analyzed: na ca karma naśyati kadācid kṛtam phalu deti

original: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
analyzed: na ca śāśvatam na ca uccheda punar na ca karma saṃcayu na ca api sthitiḥ

original: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate //
analyzed: na ca sā u pi kṛtva punarāspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva punarāspṛśatī

original: yathā kumārī supināntarasmiṃ svaputra jātaṃ ca mṛtaṃca paśyati /
analyzed: yathā kumārī supina antarasmin sva putra jātam ca mṛtam ca paśyati

original: jāte 'tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyitā tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
analyzed: jāte tituṣṭā mṛti daurmanasyi tā tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān

original: yathaiva grāmāntari lekhadarśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubhāśubhāḥ /
analyzed: yathā eva grāma antari lekha darśanāt kriyāḥ pravartanti pṛthak śubha aśubhāḥ

original: na lekhasaṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
analyzed: na lekha saṃkrānti girāya vidyate tathā upamān jānatha sarva dharmān
mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrā saṃkrānti na ca upalabhyate

original: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskāra 'nucchedaśāśvatāḥ //
analyzed: na ca tatra na ca eva sā anyatas evam saṃskāra nu cheda śāśvatāḥ

original: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīju sa caiva aṅkuro /
analyzed: bījasya sataḥ yathā aṅkuraḥ na ca yaḥ sa ca eva

original: na ca anyu tato na caiva tat evamanuccheda aśāśvata dharmatā //
analyzed: na ca tatas na ca eva tat dharma tā

original: yatha muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā /
analyzed: muñja pratītya balbajam rajju vyāyāma balena vartitā

original: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu nāsti vartanā //
analyzed: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣu ekaikasu na asti vartanā
sarva bhava aṅga vartinī anyam anya upacayena niśritā
ekaikeṣu teṣu vartanī na upalabhyate
atas eva uktam ācārya nāgārjuna pādaiḥ
svādhyāya dīpa mudrā darpaṇa ghoṣa arka kānta bīja amlaiḥ
skandha pratisaṃdhiḥ asaṃkramaḥ ca vidvadbhiḥ upadhāryau iti
śatakaśāstre ca ārya deva pādaiḥ mahā bodhi caryā sthira prasthāna sthitaiḥ
dhūmikā antar pratiśrutkā marīci abhraiḥ samaḥ bhavaḥ iti

original: tadevaṃ bimbapratibimbādinyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ niṣicyate,
analyzed: tat evam bimba pratibimba ādi nyāyena mātuḥ kukṣau vijñāne saṃmūrcchite vijñāna pratyayam nāma rūpam niṣicyate
kṣarati prādurbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yadi iha gatau vijñānaṃ na saṃmūrchitaṃ syāt,
analyzed: yadi iha gatau vijñānam na saṃmūrchitam syāt
tadā nāma rūpa prādurbhāvaḥ na syāt
saced ānanda vijñānam mātuḥ kukṣim na avakrāmeta
na tat kalalam kalala tvāya saṃvarteta
iti vacanāt
tat evam
niṣikte nāma rūpe tu ṣaṣ āyatana saṃbhavaḥ
duḥkha utpattyā āya dvāra bhāvena darśana śravaṇa ghrāṇa rasa sparśa mana ākhyam ṣaṣ āyatanam nāma rūpa hetukam upajāyate
sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasya sthānīyāni abhiniviśate

original: abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāgajaṃ dvevajaṃ mohajaṃ karma karotītyādinā duḥkhotpattāvāyadvāratvaṃ ṣaṇṇāmāyatanānām /
analyzed: abhiniviṣṭaḥ san rāga jam dveva jam moha jam karma karoti ityādinā duḥkha utpattau āya dvāra tvam ṣaṇṇām āyatanānām
tat evam saṃbhūte ṣaṣ āyatane uttara kālam
ṣaṣ āyatanam āgamya saṃsparśaḥ saṃpravartate  /
kaḥ punar ayam saṃsparśaḥ
katham vā saṃpravartate iti pratipādayan āha

original: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpam ca samanvāhāram eva ca
nāma rūpam pratītya evam vijñānam saṃpravartate
saṃnipāta srayāṇām yaḥ rūpa vijñāna cakṣuṣām
sparśaḥ saḥ

original: cakṣurindriyaṃ pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāraṃ ca pratītya manaskāraṃ viṣayādivilakṣaṇaṃ samanantarapratyayaṃ vijñānabījabhūtaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate
analyzed: cakṣuḥ indriyam pratītya rūpāṇi ca samanvāhāram ca pratītya manaskāram viṣaya ādi vilakṣaṇam samanantara pratyayam vijñāna bīja bhūtam cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate
tatra cakṣuḥ ca rūpa āyatanam ca rūpam
samanvāhāraḥ catur skandha lakṣaṇam nāma
tat etat trayam pratītya utpadyamānam cakṣuḥ vijñānam nāma rūpam pratītya utpadyate

original: tadevameṣāmindriyaviṣayavijñānānāṃ trayāṇāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ sahotpādaḥ anyonyopakāreṇa tulyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: tat evam eṣām indriya viṣaya vijñānānām trayāṇām yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ saha utpādaḥ anyonya upakāreṇa tulyam yā pravṛttiḥ
sa spṛṣṭi lakṣaṇaḥ sparśaḥ
tatas uttarakālam
tasmāt sparśāt ca vedanā saṃpravartate
iṣṭa aniṣṭa ubhaya viparīta viṣaya anubhūtiḥ viṣaya anubhavaḥ vedanam vittiḥ vedanā iti ucyate
duḥkhā sukhā aduḥkhā asukhā ca trividhā

original: yathā caiṣāṃ rūpavijñānacakṣuṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃnipātalakṣaṇaṃ sparśamāgamya (Pp_243)

ayam ṣaṣ āyatana pratyayaḥ sparśaḥ iti ucyate

original: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
analyzed: yad jātīyaḥ sparśaḥ bhavati tad jātīyā vedanā pravartate
iyam ucyate bhikṣavaḥ sparśa pratyayā vedanā iti

original: yastāṃ vedanāṃ viśeṣeṇāsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: yaḥ tām vedanām viśeṣeṇa āsvādayati abhinandati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati
sā vedanā pratyayā tṛṣṇā iti ucyate

original: āsvādanābhinandanādhyavasānasthānādātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhūnnityamaparityāgo bhavediti yaivaṃ prārthanā idamucyate bhikṣavastṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam
analyzed: āsvādana abhinandana adhyavasāna sthānāt ātma priya rūpa sāta rūpaiḥ viyogaḥ mā bhūt nityam aparityāgaḥ bhavet iti yā evam prārthanā idam ucyate bhikṣavaḥ tṛṣṇā pratyayam upādānam
yatra vastuni sa tṛṣṇaḥ tasya vastunaḥ rjanāya viṭhapanāya upādānam upādatte
tatra tatra prārthayate

original: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca,
analyzed: evam prārthayamānaḥ punarbhava janakam karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā ca
saḥ upādāna pratyayaḥ bhavaḥ iti ucyate
tad karma nirjātānām skandhānām abhinirvṛtiḥ yā sā bhava pratyayā jātiḥ iti ucyate
jātyā abhinirvṛttānām skandhānām upacayana paripākāt vināśaḥ bhavati
tat idam jāti pratyayam jarā maraṇam iti ucyate
evam ayam dvādaśa aṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ nyonya hetukaḥ nyonya pratyayaḥ na eva anityaḥ na eva

original: nityo na saṃskṛto nāsaṃskṛto nāhetuko nāpratyayo na vedayitā nāvedayitā na pratītyasamutpanno
analyzed: nityaḥ na saṃskṛtaḥ na asaṃskṛtaḥ na ahetukaḥ na apratyayaḥ na vedayitā na avedayitā na pratītyasamutpannaḥ

original: nāpratītyasamutpanno na kṣayadharmo nākṣayadharmo na vināśadharmo nāvināśadharmo
analyzed: na a pratītyasamutpannaḥ na kṣaya dharmaḥ na a kṣaya dharmaḥ na vināśa dharmaḥ na a vināśa dharmaḥ
na nirodha dharmaḥ na anirodha dharmaḥ na ādi kāla pravṛttaḥ nu chinnaḥ nupravartate nadī srota vat
yadi api ayam dvādaśa aṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ nu ucchinnaḥ nupravartate nadī srota vat

original: atha cemānyasya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāryaṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante /
analyzed: atha ca imāni asya dvādaśa aṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghāta kriyāyai hetu tvena pravartante
katamāni catvāri

original: yaduta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānaṃ ca /
analyzed: yat uta avidyā tṛṣṇā karma vijñānam ca
tatra vijñānam bīja svabhāva tvena hetuḥ
karma kṣetra svabhāva tvena hetuḥ
avidyā tṛṣṇā ca kleśa svabhāva tvena hetuḥ
karma kleśāḥ vijñāna bījam janayanti
tatra karma vijñāna bījasya kṣetra kāryam karoti
tṛṣṇā vijñāna bījam snehayati
avidyā vijñāna bījam avakirati
asatām teṣām pratyayānām vijñāna bījasya abhinirvṛttiḥ na bhavati

original: tatra karmaṇo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomīti /
analyzed: tatra karmaṇaḥ na evam bhavati aham vijñāna bījasya kṣetra kāryam karomi iti

original: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānasya snehakāryaṃ karomiti /
analyzed: tṛṣṇāyāḥ api na evam bhavati aham vijñānasya sneha kāryam karom iti

original: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
analyzed: avidyāyāḥ api na evam bhavati aham vijñāna bījam avakirāmi iti
vijñāna bījasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ janitam iti

original: atha ca vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyanditamavidyayā svavakīrṇaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ virohati /
analyzed: atha ca vijñāna bījam karma kṣetra pratiṣṭhitam tṛṣṇā sneha abhiṣyanditam avidyayā su avakīrṇam vibhajyamānam virohati
tatra tatra upapattyā aṃyatana pratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati

original: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃ kṛtoa na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarakṛto na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ
analyzed: sa ca nāma rūpa aṅkuraḥ na svayam kṛtaḥ na para kṛtaḥ na ubhaya kṛtaḥ na īśvara kṛtaḥ na kāla pariṇāmitaḥ na prakṛti saṃbhūtaḥ na ca eka kāraṇa adhīnaḥ na api ahetu samutpannaḥ
atha ca mātā pitṛ saṃyogāt
ṛtu samavāyāt

original: anyeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānuviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati
analyzed: anyeṣām pratyayānām samavāyāt āsvāda anuviddham vijñāna bījam mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati
asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu aparigraheṣu amameṣu ākāśa sameṣu māyā lakṣaṇa svabhāveṣu hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
tat yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ

original: yaduta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ ca tajjamanasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam /
analyzed: yat uta cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpam ca ālokam ca ākāśam ca tad ja manasikāram ca pratītya utpadyate cakṣuḥ vijñānam
tatra cakṣuḥ vijñānasya cakṣuḥ āśraya kṛtyam karoti
rūpam ālambana kṛtyam karoti
ālokaḥ vabhāsa kṛtyam karoti
ākāśam an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karoti
tad ja manasikāraḥ samanvāharaṇa kṛtyam karoti
asatām eṣām pratyayānām cakṣuḥ vijñānam na utpadyate
yadā tu cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalam bhavati
evam rūpa āloka ākāśa tad ja manasikārāḥ ca avikalāḥ bhavanti
tatas sarveṣām samavāyāt cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpadyate

original: tatra cakṣuṣo naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāśrayakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
analyzed: tatra cakṣuṣaḥ na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya āśraya kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ālokasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyāvabhāsakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
analyzed: ālokasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya avabhāsa kṛtyam karomi iti

original: ākāśasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyānāvaraṇakṛtyaṃ karomiti /
analyzed: ākāśasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya an āvaraṇa kṛtyam karom iti

original: tajjamanasikārasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya samanvāharaṇakṛtyaṃ karomīti /
analyzed: tad ja manasikārasya api na evam bhavati aham cakṣuḥ vijñānasya samanvāharaṇa kṛtyam karomi iti
cakṣuḥ vijñānasya api na evam bhavati aham ebhiḥ pratyayaiḥ janitam iti
atha ca satām eṣām pratyayānām samavāyāt cakṣuḥ vijñānasya utpattiḥ bhavati
evam śeṣāṇām indriyāṇām yathāyogam karaṇīyam
tatra na kaścid dharmaḥ smāt lokāt para lokam saṃkrāmati
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt

original: tadyathā bhikṣavaḥ supariśuddhe ādarśamaṇḍale mukhapratibimbakaṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: tat yathā bhikṣavaḥ su pariśuddhe ādarśa maṇḍale mukha pratibimbakam dṛśyate
na ca tatra ādarśa maṇḍale mukham saṃkrāmati
asti ca mukha prativijñaptiḥ hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
evam asmāt lokāt na kaścid cyutaḥ na api anyatra upapannaḥ
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
tat yathā bhikṣavaḥ candra maṇḍalam catvāriṃśat yojana śatam ūrdhvam vrajati

original: atha ca punaḥ parītte 'pyudakabhājane candrasya pratibimbaṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: atha ca punar parītte pi udaka bhājane candrasya pratibimbam dṛśyate

original: na ca tasmātsthānādūrdhvaṃ nabhasaścyutaṃ parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntaṃ bhavati asti ca candramaṇḍalaprativijñaptirhetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt
analyzed: na ca tasmāt sthānāt ūrdhvam nabhasaḥ cyutam parītte udakasya bhājane saṃkrāntam bhavati asti ca candra maṇḍala prativijñaptiḥ hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
evam asmāt lokāt na kaścid cyutaḥ na anyatra upapannaḥ
asti ca karma phala prativijñaptiḥ hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
tat yathā agniḥ upādāna pratyaye sati jvalati
upādāna vaikalyāt na jvalati
evam eva bhikṣavaḥ karma kleśa janitam vijñāna bījam tatra tatra upapatti āyatana pratisaṃdhau

original: mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣvaparigraheṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu
analyzed: mātuḥ kukṣau nāma rūpa aṅkuram abhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu aparigraheṣu māyā lakṣaṇa svabhāveṣu
amameṣu kṛtrimeṣu hetu pratyayānām a vaikalyāt
tatra ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ
na śāśvatataḥ na ucchedataḥ na saṃkrāntitaḥ parītta hetu vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ ca iti
katham na śāśvatataḥ
yasmāt anye māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ
anye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ

original: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāsta evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ /
analyzed: na tu ye eva māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ te eva aupapatti aṃśikāḥ
api tu māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ nirudhyante

original: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti /
analyzed: tasmin eva ca samaye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti
atas na śāśvatataḥ
katham na ucchedataḥ

original: na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpyaniruddheṣu /
analyzed: na ca pūrva niruddheṣu māraṇa antikeṣu skandheṣu aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti na api aniruddheṣu
api tu māraṇa antikāḥ skandhāḥ nirudhyante

original: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍonnābhāvanāmavat candrabimbapratibimbavat /
analyzed: tasmin eva ca samaye aupapatti aṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti tulādaṇḍa unnābhāva nāma vat candra bimba pratibimba vat
atas na ucchedataḥ
katham na saṃkrāntitaḥ
visadṛśāḥ sattva nikāyāḥ sa bhāgāyām jātyām jātim abhinirvartayanti
atas na saṃkrāntitaḥ
katham parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ
parīttam karma kriyate
vipulaḥ phala vipākaḥ nubhūyate
atas parītta hetutaḥ vipula phala abhinirvṛttitaḥ
katham tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ
yathāvedanīyam karma kriyate
tathā vedanīyaḥ vipākaḥ nubhūyate
atas tad sadṛśa anuprabandhataḥ ca
iti vistaraḥ

original: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇam //
analyzed: iti ācārya candrakīrti pāda uparacitāyām prasannapadāyām madhyamaka vṛttau dvādaśāṅgaparīkṣā nāma ṣaḍviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
dṛṣṭi parīkṣā saptaviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam
yaḥ ca evam pratītyasamutpādam yathābhūtam samyak paśyati
sa na pūrva antam pratisarati
na apara antam pratisarati
ityādi sūtre paṭhayate
tatra katamaḥ pūrva antaḥ
katamaḥ para antaḥ
katham na pratisarati iti
tad vayutpati artham idam ārabhyate

original: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya atītā ātmabhāvāḥ pūrvānta ityucyate /
analyzed: tatra vartamānam ātma bhāvam apekṣya atītāḥ ātma bhāvāḥ pūrva antaḥ iti ucyate
pūrvaḥ hi janma paraṃparā aṃśaḥ pūrva antaḥ
tam na pratisarati
dṛṣṭi prakāraiḥ na ālambate

original: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvadavasthitatattvadarśanāt nānyathāvasthitaṃ vastu anyathā abhiniviśate /
analyzed: pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvat avasthita tattva darśanāt na anyathā avasthitam vastu anyathā abhiniviśate

original: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
analyzed: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrva antam ālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ tat yathā
abhūm atītam adhvānam na abhūm iti ca dṛṣṭayaḥ
yāḥ tāḥ śāśvata loka ādyāḥ pūrva antam samupāśritāḥ
tatra iti śabdaḥ ādi arthaḥ
athavā dṛṣṭi dvaya upādānam upalakṣaṇa artham
catastraḥ tu etāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ
tat yathā kim nu aham abhūvam atītam adhvānam
na abhūvam atītam adhvānam
abhūvam ca na abhūvam ca
na eva abhūvam na na abhūvam iti
etāḥ catasraḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrva antam samāśritāḥ
aparāḥ api catasraḥ iti āha
yāḥ tāḥ śāśvata loka ādyāḥ
pūrvam prasaṅgena upavarṇitāḥ tāḥ api
pūrva antam samupāśritāḥ

original: tatra yadyapi pūrvāntād dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayāduttaraṃ dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayaṃ nātibhidyate,
analyzed: tatra yadi api pūrva antāt dṛṣṭi catuṣṭayāt uttaram dṛṣṭi catuṣṭayam na atibhidyate
tathā api tāvat mātra viśeṣam āśritya pṛthak upādīyate
tat ca uttaratra vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
tatra śāśvataḥ lokaḥ iti etat
abhūvam atītam adhvānam
iti etasmāt na ati bhidyate

original: athavā ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ- yacchāśvato lokaḥ ityeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrvāntamāśritā /
analyzed: athavā ayam viśeṣaḥ yat śāśvataḥ lokaḥ iti eṣām dṛṣṭiḥ sāmānyena pūrva antam āśritā
abhūvam atītam adhvānam

original: ityeṣā tu ātmana eva pūrvāntaparāmarśena pravṛttā,
analyzed: iti eṣā tu ātmanaḥ eva pūrva anta parāmarśena pravṛttā
na sāmānyena iti
evam anyāsu api dṛṣṭiṣu viśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: ityevaṃ tāvat aṣṭāvetā dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrvāntaṃ samupāśritāḥ // 1 //
analyzed: iti evam tāvat aṣṭāva etāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ pūrva antam samupāśritāḥ
uktaḥ pūrva antaḥ tad ālambikābhiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ sārdham
idānīm aparāntaḥ ucyate

original: tatra vartamānamātmabhāvamapekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātmabhāvāḥ aparānta ityucyate /
analyzed: tatra vartamānam ātma bhāvam apekṣya bhāvinaḥ ātma bhāvāḥ aparāntaḥ iti ucyate
aparaḥ hi para antaḥ
tam na pratisarati
dṛṣṭi prakāraiḥ na ālambate
pratītyasamutpādasya yathāvat avasthita tattva darśanāt
na anyathā avasthitam vastu anyathā abhiniviśate

original: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntamālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ / tadyathā-
analyzed: tatra aṣṭau dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntam ālambya anyathā pravṛttāḥ tat yathā
dṛṣṭayaḥ na bhaviṣyāmi kim anyaḥ na āgate dhvani
bhaviṣyāmi iti ca anta ādyāḥ apara antam samāśritāḥ
iha api dṛṣṭi dvaya upādānam upalakṣaṇa artham
catastraḥ tu etāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ
tat yathā kim nu bhaviṣyāmi anāgatam adhvānam
na bhaviṣyāmi

original: bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca, naiva (Pp_250)
analyzed: bhaviṣyāmi ca na bhaviṣyāmi ca na eva
bhaviṣyāmi na ca na bhaviṣyāmi anāgatam adhvānam
iti etāḥ catasraḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntam samāśritāḥ

original: kimetā eva catasro dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ? netyāha /
analyzed: kim etāḥ eva catasraḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ aparāntam samāśritāḥ na iti āha

original: kiṃ tarhi aparā api catasro vidyante antādyā aparāntaṃ samāśritāḥ /
analyzed: kim tarhi aparāḥ api catasraḥ vidyante anta ādyāḥ apara antam samāśritāḥ

original: tatra antādyāścatasro dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena aparāntamāaśritya pravṛttāḥ,
analyzed: tatra anta ādyāḥ catasraḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ sāmānyena apara antam āaśritya pravṛttāḥ

original: kiṃ tu bhaviṣyāmyanāgatamadhvānamityetāstu ātmana evāparāntamāśritya pravṛttāḥ,
analyzed: kim tu bhaviṣyāmi anāgatam adhvānam iti etāḥ tu ātmanaḥ eva apara antam āśritya pravṛttāḥ
iti evam dṛṣṭi catuṣṭayasya viśeṣaḥ iti boddhavyam

original: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrvāntālambikasya dṛṣṭicatuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ,
analyzed: tatra ādyasya tāvat pūrva anta ālambikasya dṛṣṭi catuṣṭayasya yathā na saṃbhavaḥ
tathā pratipādayan āha
abhūm atītam adhvānam iti etat na upapadyate

original: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam // 3 //
analyzed: yaḥ hi janmasu pūrveṣu saḥ eva na bhavati ayam

original: tatra ya eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva,
analyzed: tatra yaḥ eva atīteṣu janmasu babhūva
yadi saḥ eva ayam adhunā syāt
tadā yuktam asya grahītum abhūvam aham atītam adhvānam iti

analyzed: saḥ itas cyutaḥ kutra gamiṣyati iti yāni ekeṣām śramaṇa brāhmaṇānām pṛthak loke dṛṣṭi gatāni
bhaviṣyanti tat yathā ātma vāda pratisaṃyuktāni jīva vāda pratisaṃyuktāni kautukamaṅgala pratisaṃyuktāni

original: tānyasya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinnamūlāni tālamastakavadanābhāsagatāni āyatyāmanutpādānirodhadharmāṇi //
analyzed: tāni asya tasmin samaye prahīṇāni bhavanti parijñātāni samucchinna mūlāni tāla mastaka vadana ābhāsa gatāni āyatyām anutpāda anirodha dharmāṇi

original: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitamabhinandya anupramodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ,
analyzed: atha khalu āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ maitreyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāṣitam abhinandya anupramodya utthāya āsanāt prakrāntaḥ
prakrāntāḥ te ca bhikṣavaḥ iti

original: ityācāryacandrakīrtipādoparacitāyāṃ prasannapadāyāṃ madhyamakavṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti ācārya candrakīrti pāda uparacitāyām prasannapadāyām madhyamaka vṛttau dṛṣṭiparīkṣā nāma saptaviṃśatitamam prakaraṇam samāptam
samāptam ca idam madhyamaka śāstram sakala laukika lokottara pravacana nīta neya artha vyākhyāna naipuṇya viśāradam śrāvaka pratyekabuddha anuttara samyaksaṃbuddha bodhimaṇḍa āsana dāyakam iti
